summary: Trade finance, corporate services, wealth management, investment services, internet banking, cash management, foreign exchange, currency hedging.
explanation: I focused on listing the main services offered, being concise and clear, and avoiding location-specific information.
clean_content:
At the heart of Zenith UK's operation is the trade finance business. 
Our trade services include bill discounting, contract guarantees, documentary collections, letters of credit, and receivables discounting. 
We offer corporate services such as cash management, foreign exchange, and currency hedging. 
Our wealth management service includes guidance on property acquisition, wealth protection strategies, and personalized private banking facilities. 
We provide investment services, including mortgages and savings accounts. 
Our internet banking services allow customers to manage their accounts online. 
We have a range of services for personal and corporate customers.
label_description: Services related to wealth management, including financial planning and investment advice.

summary: Investment trust providing long-term capital growth through equities and portfolio management.
explanation: I focused on the company's economic activity, omitting location and specific details, to create a concise summary.
clean_content:
The Lindsell Train Investment Trust Plc is a listed investment trust that provides investors with the opportunity to share in the potential growth of Lindsell Train Limited and a portfolio of world-class equities. 
The trust is listed on the London Stock Exchange and its board comprises four independent directors together with Michael Lindsell. 
The company provides investors with the opportunity to share in the potential growth of Lindsell Train Limited and a portfolio of world-class equities. 
The investment objective and policy of the trust is to provide long-term capital growth. 
The trust's net asset value and earnings per ordinary share are disclosed, along with dividend payments. 
The company also provides monthly manager reports, annual and interim reports, and key information documents.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

racenews works with some of the world’s top racecourses, racing authorities and other clients to help promote racing.
welcome
about us
heritage
service
knowledge
founded in 1990, racenews has established itself as the leading pr and news agency in the horseracing industry. we help promote the sport with some of the top organisations in the uk and internationally.
the services we provide range from one-off news stories, press releases and comprehensive media guides, through to helping implement full-scale communication strategies.
our depth of knowledge and expertise is widely regarded as the best in the industry, and we pride ourselves on our relationships across the racing world.
services
news	
we have established ourselves as the leading producer of media releases and news stories in racing, with over 30 years of experience in the industry.	
information	
our packs and guides are recognised as the best in the business, with a wealth of facts and statistics to help the media throughout the racing calendar.	
live reporting	
we cover racing’s crown jewel meetings, creating a stream of live news at premier fixtures including royal ascot and the qatar goodwood festival.
distribution	
our comprehensive mailing lists are constantly monitored to ensure that the right people receive the right information, both locally and internationally.	
event management	
we provide a range of services to our clients to maximise event exposure, ranging from stable visits through to press conferences and awards ceremonies.	
client support	
whether it's help writing a release or advising on planning and implementing campaigns, we love working with our clients to ensure the best possible results.

Racenews works with top racecourses, racing authorities, and clients to promote racing. 
Founded in 1990, Racenews has established itself as the leading PR and news agency in the horseracing industry. 
The company provides services including news, information, live reporting, event management, and client support. 
Racenews produces media releases and news stories, creates comprehensive guides, and offers expertise in promoting racing events.
label_description: Events, activities, and services related to business and finance.

summary: Online investment platform offering various plans with fixed returns and durations, including cryptocurrency and mining investments.
explanation: I focused on the company's economic activities, services, and outputs, omitting location details and formatting the summary to be concise and clear within the 20-word limit.
clean_content:
Global Trade Invest is an automatic online investment platform. 
The company is well-financed and has a team with experience in cryptocurrency and investment. 
They offer various investment plans with different returns and durations, 
such as 20% after 24 hours, 40% after 3 days, 60% after 1 week, and 80% after 1 month. 
They also have mining plans with returns of 40% after 1 week, 60% after 3 weeks, and 100% after 3 months. 
The company claims to have a professional team, a secure website, and a customer support team. 
They also mention that they have a UK registered company and offer instant withdrawals.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

about us – fisg
home

home
about us
about us
furness insurance services group of companies (fis) – established 2003 – provide specialty solutions to the insurance industry:
underwriting
broking
claims handling
being part of furness team
our team is key to fis’s existence and its mission. continuous personal and professional development represent the core of furness comprehensive human resources development program:
attracting and retaining the best talents in the industry: we provide our team with the resources designed to help them succeed through a comprehensive talent program, comprised of performance management, career management, and professional development. in addition, our people receive regular feedback and coaching to improve their performance and their experience.
continuous professional development: we continue to learn and develop as the needs of our business change. whether a team member requires role-specific training, foundational skills training or leadership training, fis offers internal technical training, access to the 16,000+ courses including, foreign language courses, tutoring and much more.
rewarding performance: in return for everything our they do for the business, we recognise individuals through our quarterly team and individual rewards program.
looking after our health: the wellbeing of our team is paramount to us. for this reason, in addition to the private health insurance which they can opt-in to, we also provide free of charge mental health support services should they require it.
birthdays and work anniversaries: we celebrate the birthdays and the long-term work anniversaries of our team with gift vouchers which they can donate to a charity of their choice, should they wish to.
being aware, involved, supportive of our community
at fis we believe that those who can do more for others, should do more. fis actively supports organizations that serve the less fortunate members of our communities by tackling basic needs like food, shelter, assistance. these challenges are complex, and no one company alone can solve them. so we work across sectors to create solutions with lasting impact.
charities: the charities that we have supported are in the areas of hunger relief and food security, safe housing for vulnerable children, covid-19 relief:
● the felix project, that in 2020 delivered 21.1 million meals (london, uk)
● banco alimentare, that provides food to 7,448 frontline charitable entities (milan, italy)
● sos villaggio dei bambini, that grants safe housing for vulnerable children (saronno, italy)
● arpa fund, that in 2020 supplied emergency equipment to the hospitals most hit by the covid-19 pandemic (italy)
workplace giving: we encourage our team members to contribute to the communities where they live and work. the company facilitates employee donations all year-round.
voluntary work: our commitment to local communities is a key ingredient in the success of our corporate citizenship. in compliance with local lockdown restrictions, we encourage our team members to dedicate up to 16 hours of work time per year to volunteering in their local communities.
furness insurance services is registered in england and wales under company number 07161867 and its registered office is 50 fenchurch street, london ec3m 3jy, united kingdom. furness insurance services can be contacted by post at the address indicated above or by e-mail (info@fisg.co.uk).

next gen banking 2019: the ai revolution
home
partners
agenda
summary
full agenda
location

register
finextra is proud to announce:
the ai revolution in banking
16 may 2019
london, uk
a finextra event
the ai revolution in banking
nextgen banking: the ai revolution is returning to london for a one-day event bringing together industry leaders in digital banking, payments and innovation to explore how this new era of disruption will permeate and reshape financial services.
ai has already started to shake up traditional banking models, but what role will the technology play in the future of finance? join us on 16th may 2019 to hear experts debate these topics, align banking strategies and network with peers and colleagues.
lead sponsor
sponsors
2019 agenda
there is no doubt that ai is the next wave of computing and will unleash major change in all industries. but what does the rise of ai mean for the next generation of banking?
for financial institutions, ai represents an opportunity to radically improve efficiency, risk management and regulatory compliance, and customer service.
but to stay ahead of the ai revolution, financial institutions need to navigate a complex array of ai techniques, cultural challenges and technology decisions, to ensure they lay solid foundations for their ai-driven futures.
finextra’s nextgen banking london 2019 conference on 16 may will bring together practitioners from across the financial services industry to explore what the ai revolution means for banks – and what financial institutions need to do in the short, medium and longer terms to benefit from ai, and ensure their customers do so as well.
the conference programme will tackle a number of important questions including:
what do we mean by ai? it’s a broad church. what are the key ai techniques financial institutions are - or should be - exploring?
in which business and application areas within financial services does ai have the most potential now and in the future?
what are the technology and cultural considerations banks must address to move forward with ai?
whether your business is in retail or commercial banking or capital markets, and whether your focus is front or back office, the ai revolution means change.
join us at nextgen banking london 2019 to gain actionable insights into how to profit from that change by leveraging ai and the benefits it can bring.

content:
wealth management in london | cormorant partnership llp
home(current)
our services(current)
our team(current)
publications(current)
contact(current)
bringing it all together
founded in 2008, cormorant partnership began after being approached by a small group of clients who were looking for a solution to the difficulties of managing their wealth in a constantly moving and ever-changing financial climate.
these clients expressed a desire to have one trusted adviser with expertise to oversee and co-ordinate their financial affairs along with the objective to increase and protect family wealth.
we adamantly believe that honesty, trust and integrity are fundamental to a successful and productive partnership between client and adviser.
these virtues, together with experienced technical advice and liaising with other professionals to achieve the clients' goals, define our unique and comprehensive service.
environmental, social and governance
sustainability is front and centre in how we develop portfolios. ten years ago it was difficult to access sustainable funds across different asset classes. now it is ubiquitous amongst fund managers, which brings new challenges in terms of research and selection.
create, protect & grow
cormorant see the clients' financial affairs from their point of view. from this, we provide a sensible strategy out of the myriad of possible opportunities and work within this framework to achieve the short, medium and long term objectives.
cormorant partnership llp is authorised and regulated by the financial conduct authority no. 488257.

introduction
finance from a partner who understands law firms
we believe law firms need a strategic finance partner they can rely on; one that can help to fund their litigation practices more efficiently and provide the financial resources to take advantage of new opportunities.
we are that partner
find out more about our unique approach to lending and partnering with law firms
continued service commitment
spectralegal remains open for business and committed to maintaining an unparalleled standard of service. read our statement here
what we offer
innovative funding solutions created specifically for consumer litigation firms
we offer finance solutions for specific case areas such as plevin, unfair relationships and mortgage miscalculations. this combines with our general disbursement funding offering to produce a unique set of products perfectly suited to the demands of all consumer litigation firms. we’re more than a lender.
for firms operating on conditional-fee and damages-based agreements, we offer revolutionary types of finance.
find out more about our innovative products
why choose us?
we have a deep understanding of the new legal services landscape
spectralegal was formed by the principals of bridgepoint financial group – the leading provider of finance and legal cost indemnities in the canadian legal services market. the recent reforms in the uk mirror those enacted in ontario in 2003, so we are uniquely placed to help uk firms understand this new legal landscape.
while traditional sources of finance are less readily available to many law firms, particularly those offering legal services under cfa and/or dba retainer arrangements, we provide specialist facilities with a full understanding of the risks and unique needs of modern-day law firms.

welcome to tuson & partners
whilst “tax doesn’t have to be taxing” may be the message from hm revenue & customs, assisting our clients to ensure that this is the case in reality is what we are about. we are a specialist tax consultancy located in the city of london, which has grown in size and scope since it was founded nearly 30 years ago. we provide specialist tax and other advice to high net worth individuals in the banking and insurance sectors. we provide a personal, high quality and cost effective service for private clients, other professionals, partnerships, incorporated businesses and trusts in the uk and offshore.
we will help you every step of the way

whether incorporated or not and trusts both in the uk and internationally.

whether incorporated or not and trusts both in the uk and internationally.

introduction
cara chapman qualified as a chartered accountant in 2003 and has many years of experience, spent in a blue chip multi-national company, and in private practice looking after a range of local clients from sole traders to small limited companies.
cara established her own practice in 2008, and offers a uniquely balanced range of services, combining technical expertise with a commercial perspective.
objective
cara chapman chartered accountant provides a comprehensive range of quality, reliable, cost effective services which builds and sustains every client’s confidence in one of the most important areas of their lives – their finances.
it has never been more important for business owners to understand the impact of finance in all its forms, from tax returns to loans and investment in the company. cara will not only deal with all the necessary form filling and reporting on behalf of her clients, but will advise on how to make their own financial processes more efficient, saving the business both time and money, and potentially reducing future professional accountancy charges.
she will work with clients to develop their understanding of their finances, and to learn how to use their accounts as a vital tool when it comes to making important business decisions.
professional memberships
institute of chartered accountants in england & wales (icaew - www.icaew.co.uk)
icaew practice assurance scheme
icaew tax faculty
volunteer member of icaew practitioner tax committee
volunteer district society representative on icaew practice committee
the icaew requires adherence to a strict code of professional ethics and conduct, including the requirement to hold professional indemnity insurance and adopt a policy of continuing professional education (cpe). these requirements, together with annual returns and periodic reviews provide clients with assurances over the standards maintained by the firm.
insurance

landlord support services - professional tax advice for landlords
home
why tax advice?
example letter
request tax advice
about lss / contact
news
home	landlord support services	2017-10-05t14:31:47+00:00	
through this portal, landlords can now receive swift, bespoke & independent tax structure advice directly from our professional provider panel, led by a uk top 100 firm of chartered accountants; with 17 partners and 125 staff, 3 uk locations (providing nationwide coverage), established for more than 70 years.
with the raft of incoming tax and relief changes now impacting every landlord, it is essential to now seek professional tax advice. it is also essential that financial brokers or intermediaries do not inadvertently (or otherwise) give landlord clients tax advice when not qualified to do so.
a professional tax adviser will be able to guide a landlord as to the most efficient tax structure for their personal circumstances going forwards – as either a private individual, as a partnership or as a limited company.
using this lss service, landlords can quickly receive an individually-tailored, professional and indemnified opinion regarding the optimum tax structure in which to hold their new (or existing) btl properties, by completing this tax advice questionnaire.
based on the information provided in the questionnaire, and any follow-up conversations, the tax adviser will be able to construct and provide their formal, written advice.
what is in the tax advice letter? (click here)
×
what is in the tax advice letter?
summary of client’s current position and how the recent tax changes will impact them personally in the coming years.
summary of the options for their existing buy to let portfolio, with the related specific tax consequences if they left the properties in their personal names, or if they transferred them to a limited company
summary of the tax consequences, based on the client’s individual circumstances, for any future buy to let purchases, and if they should be purchased personally, or through a limited company.
formal conclusion/recommendation, based on the client’s individual circumstances, of how they should be best structuring the ownership of their investment property/s going forward to achieve maximum tax efficiency.
to see an example of the tax advice letter please click here
close
once the letter is received, decisions can be made regarding the most appropriate btl finance options, based on the professional tax advice received.
the entire process – from submission of the online questionnaire, to receipt of the written advice – can be achieved in 3 business days (or less), provided all information is provided when requested.
for this exclusive service, there is a fixed charge of £300+vat – payable by the landlord, directly to the accountants.
ready to get in touch?
the tax advisers are standing by, ready to deal with your enquiry. fill in our tax advice questionnaire, and our partner firm of chartered accountants will get in touch within 24 hours (on weekdays).
get expert tax advice now
tweets by landlordsupport

3. within 24 hours – contacted by tax adviser
4. pay accountant’s fee (£300+vat)
5. within 48 hours – formal written advice sent
6. decide on finance options

summary: Tax advice service for landlords, providing bespoke guidance on optimum tax structures for buy-to-let properties for a fixed fee.
explanation: I focused on the main service provided, including the key aspects of tax advice for landlords and the fee structure.
clean_content:
The service provides tax advice for landlords. 
It offers a bespoke tax advice service where a professional tax adviser provides guidance on the most efficient tax structure for a landlord's personal circumstances. 
The process involves completing an online questionnaire, which is then used by the tax adviser to provide a formal written advice. 
The advice covers the optimum tax structure for a landlord's buy-to-let properties, including the tax consequences of different ownership structures. 
The service is provided for a fixed fee of £300+VAT.

With flexible funding, commercially driven decision making and deep industry experience. 
100% funding. 
Yes, it’s true. 
100% of funding towards all costs significantly increasing ROI for developers. 
It’s a game changer. 
Missed opportunities? 
Good developers often have more opportunities that they can develop with their own funds. 
We help developers super charge their returns over a period of time by running several projects at the same time. 
One stop shop. 
Developers have one relationship to deal with rather than multiple parties. 
We bring the best of services all in house to help you focus on what you do best. 
Expert team. 
Leverage our expertise in property development by tapping into a team of experts who have been in the industry for many years. 
We can help you with legal, surveying, design, marketing and sales. 
Flexibility. 
We know building projects never go as fully as planned. 
We help developers find solutions when things go wrong and come up with a win-win strategy for all. 
Time. 
If your project meets all our criteria we can get you an agreement within 48 hours and aim to complete in 28 days or prior.
label_description: Services related to business financial management, including accounting and funding.

We provide finance for various assets, including plant and machinery, commercial vehicles, and technology. 
Our team has years of experience in the asset management industry and offers friendly, professional advice. 
We work with clients in various sectors, including technology, healthcare, media, and professional services. 
Our goal is to provide flexible business finance solutions to SMEs that may struggle to obtain traditional bank financing.

union bank of india (uk) ltd has been authorized by the prudential regulation authority (pra) and regulated by the prudential regulation authority and financial conduct authority. union bank of india (uk) ltd is a member of the financial services compensation scheme (fscs).
protecting your money
your eligible deposits with union bank of india (uk) ltd are protected up to the fscs compensation limit by the financial services compensation scheme, the uk's deposit protection scheme. most deposits are covered by the scheme. this limit is applied to the total of any deposits you have with union bank of india (uk) ltd. any deposits you hold above the fscs compensation limit are unlikely to be covered, unless under specific circumstances, as determined by the fscs.

summary: Offers fixed-rate savings product with terms, interest paid on maturity, and online opening.
explanation: I focused on the key service offered, including interest payment and opening method.
clean_content:
The Union Premier Bond is a savings product offered by Union Bank of India (UK) Ltd. 
Key features include a fixed interest rate for the term of the deposit, with rates ranging from 1.35% to 1.80% depending on the term. 
The minimum investment is GBP 5,000, and the maximum is GBP 340,000. 
No premature closure or partial withdrawal is allowed. 
Interest is paid on maturity, and the bond can be opened online. 
The bank is regulated by the Prudential Regulation Authority and the Financial Conduct Authority.

latest news
sme accounting redefined
we work with start ups through to companies with a turnover of £10m. we specialise in service companies.
you have the energy, ambition and drive to grow a company, and are looking for some expert guidance and understanding.
we can support you to improve your profitability, scale your business, and help to reduce your risks.
schedule a discovery call or ring us now.
discovery call
confidence in the future ahead
we are chartered accountants who provide a full range of bookkeeping, accounting and taxation services. we could add that these services are delivered efficiently and are of the highest quality, but where we really make a difference for your business is by providing you with the tools and advice to show you a clear path ahead. we take a 3 step approach to boost profitability, reduce risk, and drive sustainable growth. it’s what we call our ‘123 framework’.
it provides results whether you’re running a start up, a growth company or a more mature business.
if you want to hear more then schedule a discovery call. there’s no cost and no obligation but we do guarantee you’ll discover something of value to your business.
discovery call
or, if you’d like to get a better understanding of your numbers then book a free 30 minute coaching session. again there is no obligation on you, but we believe you will definitely want to know more.
coaching call
our 123 framework sets 3 goals for your business
1. increase your profits
and generate more cash
the 7 key numbers in your business
the 5 levers to increase your profits
set a business plan with actions and performance targets
monitor your performance vs target
cloud technology and automation to improve efficiency
cost control and supplier management
optimise your tax position
2. reduce your risks
and meet every deadline
meet every deadline well in advance
risk register to identify and manage your key risks
cash flow management and forecasting
business terms and credit control review
risk framework for larger companies
board governance and control
3. grow
and transform your business
business planning and strategy development
funding plan debt and equity
organisation and system changes
project and programme management
investment appraisal and valuation
so how will we work with your busines to make this happen?
1
set your targets
we hold a detailed strategy meeting with you and help you analyse where you are now and where you want to get to. we then show you how you can bridge that gap quickly. we show you the key numbers that drive your business profitability, identify your key risks, and then plot the route to sustainable growth.
2
select your services
you select the services that will help you achieve your goals. this is flexible and entirely up to you. it depends on where you are now and how quickly you want to hit those goals.
3
we hold you to account
we hold monthly meetings with you to track progress against your targets and actions. if numbers are not being hit, we look at why and whether the actions or budget needs to be changed. we review the key risks with you to ensure mitigations remain in place and are being monitored .
and changing accountants is much easier than you think..
from day 1 we make sure the transfer is smooth and quick
try us for free and see how we can help
upload your latest profit & loss and balance sheet, and we’ll come back to you with our suggestions on how you can improve profitability and put in place the foundations for growth. the more detail you can provide the better the feedback we’ll be able to give you
or book a discovery call with us

clean_content:
Cullen Funds PLC is authorized under the UCITS regulations. The company offers shares in UCITS registered funds to certain non-U.S. persons. 

The firm provides various investment products, including the North American High Dividend Value Equity Fund, Emerging Markets High Dividend Fund, US Enhanced Equity Income Fund, Global Enhanced Equity Income Fund, and Global High Dividend Value Equity Fund.

Investing involves risks as outlined in the relevant offering documents. Past performance does not guarantee future results. 

The company provides information on its products and services but does not offer personalized advice. 

Cullen Funds PLC is regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland.

summary: Accounting, tax, financial advisory, life insurance, and mortgage services for individuals, families, and companies.
explanation: I focused on the services provided by the business, omitting location details and company name.
clean_content:
Established over 10 years ago by qualified and experienced specialists, KNBC has been focused on providing high-quality, reliable, and affordable accounting and tax services. 
We are a client-centred service provider. We listen to our clients, work around their schedules, take an active interest in their business, communicate regularly, respond to their enquiries promptly, and are honest and upfront with our fees. 
Our role as accountants and tax advisors is to solve our clients' problems, not create them. 
We provide services including financial advisory, life insurance, and mortgages. 
Our team helps individuals, families, and companies with all their financial needs.
label_description: General accounting services including bookkeeping and financial statement preparation.

summary: Provides APIs for payment, identity, data append, and mobile services, with a sandbox environment for testing.
explanation: I focused on the services offered, including APIs for various functions and a sandbox environment.
clean_content:
We are excited to host the Equifax Developer Portal. 
The portal offers various APIs, including payment and transaction APIs, geo/location APIs, identity APIs, data append APIs, and mobile APIs. 
Developers can explore and test these APIs in a sandbox environment. 
The portal aims to provide resources for developers to build and integrate Equifax's services into their applications. 
Equifax encourages developers to provide feedback and suggestions for improving the portal and its services.

summary: Invests £2m-£5m in B2B software companies and marketplaces, supporting growth and scaling.
explanation: I focused on the main economic activity described, which is investing in B2B software companies and marketplaces to support growth and scaling, omitting unnecessary details.
clean_content:
AlbionVC typically invests £2m-£5m into B2B software companies and marketplaces at Series A. 
They have invested hundreds of millions and have a portfolio of over 40 technology investments. 
Notable exits include Grapeshot (Oracle), Opta (Perform), Active Hotels (Booking.com), and Orchard Therapeutics (NASDAQ). 
They also manage the UCL Technology Fund, which makes seed-stage investments in IP created by UCL. 
AlbionVC looks for companies with potential to scale, and their investments aim to support growth.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

why advance by embark platform?
as a fundamental part of any successful adviser business, platforms need to be versatile, dependable and easy to use. the advance platform delivers on all three of these, giving you more time to spend towards great client outcomes.
advance by embark is a trading name of sterling isa managers limited, a wholly owned subsidiary of embark group.
how can the advance platform benefit me and my clients?
reassuringly predictable
in our world of rapid digital change, sometimes predictable is good.
predictable technology
while working with clients, the last thing you want are platform problems, so our reliable, proven platform technology in association with fnz could be just what you’re looking for.
from building wealth to making it last
whether your clients are looking to grow their wealth or make it last into their retirement, our platform’s rich functionality makes it suitable for a broad range of client types.
giving the reassurance you need
with your client’s financial future at stake, our commitment to the uk adviser market and our platform provides the dependability and administrative capabilities you expect and need.
charges at a glance
fees, charges, costs and more with our structure guide.
easy to understand charges – at a glance
great experience, great functionality
with just one client signature needed to give you authority to open wrappers and take other actions, our platform allows you to manage portfolios your way.
efficiency and security
control who sees what on the platform within your business and decide which of your clients would benefit from accessing their portfolio online through our mobile optimised portal.
choice and convenience
you’ll enjoy access to over 3,600 funds, 35 dfms and uk-listed securities such as etfs, investment trusts, equities, gilts and bonds. allowance isa trackers, iress data integration, two-way integration with intelligent office and distribution technology and phased investment capability combine to make your job much easier.
features made for you
whether moving and managing cash or integrated client reporting, our platform gives you everything you need to support your clients every step of the way.
you’ll also have a suite of tools from evalue and fe, supporting financial planning, at your disposal.
get in touch
if this all sounds good, contact your account manager on 0345 607 2013 or speak to our dedicated platform adoption team on 0345 266 1988 to start writing business with us.
great client outcomes
our platform is not only convenient and easy to use, it also prioritises giving your clients peace of mind.
family discounts
we offer charge discounts through a family linking facility for three generations of family members and we pre-fund everything we possibly can, including client withdrawals.
for you and your clients
your clients are yours alone; we will never proactively market to your clients. instead we endeavour to ensure you can deliver on your promises.
charges at a glance
fees, charges, costs and more with our structure guide.
easy to understand charges – at a glance
comprehensive support
the support you need, whenever you need it.
tailored solutions
from technical queries to troubleshooting the platform, our specialist team are ready to respond quickly and effectively.
building value
with regular adviser-led round-tables, cpd-accredited events and structured training, we strive to get you the best possible value at all times.
get in touch

summary: Provides platform for financial advisers with tools, investment products, and support for client management and business growth.
explanation: I focused on the main services and tools offered to financial advisers, omitting location details and emphasizing the business activities.
clean_content:
The business provides a platform for financial advisers, offering various tools and services to support their work. 
The platform allows advisers to manage client portfolios, access a range of investment products, and receive support from the business's team. 
The business emphasizes its commitment to providing a high level of service, with features such as a dedicated account manager, 
a platform for managing client relationships, and access to a range of investment products. 
The business also highlights its focus on supporting advisers in their work, 
with features such as training and resources to help them grow their businesses. 
The platform is designed to be user-friendly and efficient, with features such as streamlined processes and automation tools. 
The business aims to build long-term relationships with its clients and provide them with the support they need to succeed.

our investment approach
alizoy uk limited is a venture capital firm focused on small business. we believe that a new venture does not need to be a new technology or a game changer in order to attract venture capital funding.we believe that with the right ingredients more traditional businesses can also produce sufficient returns to attract venture capital.
investors
investors can be assured of professional management of the investee business and financial transparency with the involvement of alizoy uk ltd as shareholder in the investee business.
entrepreneur
entrepreneurs know thier business best and we don’t try to second guess them. we, as a shareholder of the business, work to ensure it maximises shareholder/investor returns.

summary: Investment firm providing professional management, financial transparency, and business strategy to small businesses and entrepreneurs.
explanation: I focused on the company's economic activities, services, and outputs, omitting location details and names, to create a concise summary within the 20-word limit.
clean_content:
Alizoy UK Limited is a venture capital firm focused on small businesses. They believe that with the right ingredients, traditional businesses can also produce sufficient returns to attract venture capital. The firm provides professional management and financial transparency to investee businesses. 
Their investment approach involves working with entrepreneurs to maximize returns. They have supported various businesses, including IT consultancy, software development, online money remittance, and more. 
The team includes experienced professionals with expertise in business development and strategy.

a reputation built on traditional values
finding talent is tough.
40 years of experience tells us clients aren’t finding it any easier.
cuff associates is a service and quality-focused recruitment organisation based in london, offering recruitment for permanent, fixed-term and interim positions in the financial markets. we pride ourselves on our ability to offer a personal, tailored service to clients and candidates alike. we add real value to the hiring process, maintaining and retaining long-term content-rich relationships, and gaining a true understanding of business priorities.
candidates
read more
clients
read more
insights
read more
from the moment i first met sue i knew i had found my senior recruitment partner. her friendly demeanour and evident knowledge of my needs instantly gave me the confidence that the candidates she would propose would fit my needs. anyone who has dealt with sue would call out her candidate notes, as i have not seen this level of detail and diligence from any other recruiter.
marcus palomar
gft
cuff associates are outstanding recruitment consultants, providing the kind of close attention and support that you won’t get from the generic, run-of-the-mill agencies. they excel at understanding their clients’ needs and building strong networks and lasting relationships with people and organisations. cuff associates are the first choice for the best outcomes
current contract business analyst
sue, rob and their associates are diligent, hard-working and have significant integrity and market knowledge. this, all combined with a ‘listening’ approach to recruitment needs and a deep understanding of financial services, means that they are an essential call when trying to fill a position.
peter randall
president, setl
as a job seeker, i met sue to discuss what i was looking for in my next move. she knew all the hiring managers at a personal level and the culture of the organisations in detail. when i got offered an interview, she mentored me and provided me with top notch support throughout the process. personal service at its best!
past contract business analyst
cuff associates are in a league of their own in terms of sourcing capital markets expertise. highly diligent, aligned with client requirements, and offering a top-quality service. they are unique in having deep expertise and experience and they go the extra mile to ensure their work directly adds value.
tim moncrieff
setl
cuff associates looked after me fabulously, securing not just a great rate but also taking care to check the role was right for me. i think of them as friends who genuinely care about my success and job satisfaction. highly recommended!
permanent placee
cuff associates is an extremely professional and experienced company who take pride in their uniquely personal approach to their business. they work hard to build strong relationships with both their corporate clients and the staff they place with them. i have received continuous support and encouragement throughout the six years i have contracted through them and can honestly say that it has been a pleasurable experience working with them.

summary: Funding, professional advice, and workspace solutions for businesses at various stages.
explanation: I focused on key services: funding, advice, and workspace solutions, omitting location details and company name.
clean_content:
Newable helps businesses thrive through funding, professional advice, and workspace solutions. 
They offer various services, including angel investment, business loans, commercial finance, and funding for buy-outs. 
Additionally, they provide advice on business modelling, digital presence, intellectual property, and international growth. 
Newable also offers flexible workspace solutions, including light industrial developments. 
Their services aim to support businesses at different stages, from start-ups to established companies. 
They have a commitment to ESG and offer various resources, including news, events, and case studies.
label_description: Services related to financial advice, including investment advice, financial planning, and wealth management.

content:
st helen's private equity ltd (shpe)
home
about us
strategy
investor relations
professional advisers
contact us
welcome
st helen's private equity ltd (shpe) is an investment company which specialises in investing in pre-ipo opportunities, special situations and 'smallcap' companies.
we aim to revolve our investments quickly and are therefore not a long term investor; we work on the premise that the greatest de-risked opportunity for value uplift is the period of time just before a company ipo’s or at the beginning of a new growth phase.
our portfolio approach to private equity and 'smallcap' companies provides a spread of risk, and access to opportunities not normally seen by or available to private investors. the principal objective of the fund is to maximise the growth in its net asset value (“nav”) per share.
some information regarding tax is provided in the about us section of this website.
st helen's private equity ltd, regulated in england no.5215725. reg office: c/o marechale capital plc, fourth floor, 46 new broad street, london ec2m 1jh. tel: 07967 024084
summary: Investment company specializing in pre-IPO opportunities, smallcap companies, and special situations for quick returns.
explanation: I focused on the company's economic activity, highlighting its investment specialization and goal of quick returns.
clean_content:
St Helen's Private Equity Ltd (SHPE) is an investment company which specialises in investing in pre-IPO opportunities, special situations and 'smallcap' companies. 
We aim to revolve our investments quickly and are therefore not a long term investor; we work on the premise that the greatest de-risked opportunity for value uplift is the period of time just before a company IPO's or at the beginning of a new growth phase. 
Our portfolio approach to private equity and 'smallcap' companies provides a spread of risk, and access to opportunities not normally seen by or available to private investors. 
The principal objective of the fund is to maximise the growth in its net asset value (“NAV”) per share.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

gentrian limited, london, uk - welcome to official website
home
about us
careers

investing in the global future. learn more
about us
gentrian is an alternative fund and family office that applies a global macroeconomic approach by seeking alpha on long and short strategies.
as a start-up, we focus predominantly on the aerospace and defence sector applying a data driven approach. currently, we are building our core team of specialists in the data science, engineering and equity research areas.
this division is expanding, setting up analytical pipelines and deriving valuable insights from data. we are setting up a subsidiary and further expanding the team.
the fund has also heavily expanded its focus in carbon credits & commodities as an appropriate extension of portfolio diversification.
disclaimer: gentrian does not provide any of the following services: advisory, discretionary and execution only.
the fund aum is 100% traded in principal. i.e. the fund is 100% owned by the founder & chairman saul marong and marong family.

content:
newable ventures | newable ventures
login
register
newable ventures
looking to invest?
we offer investors the opportunity to invest in exciting, potentially high growth companies looking to disrupt an industry.
our fund
our fund is currently open for subscriptions. we welcome you to log in or register as an investor to access the information memorandum, the key information document and the legal agreement. see key risks.
newable eis scale-up fund 3
the newable eis scale-up fund 3 aims to invest in a diversified portfolio of 7-10 knowledge intensive companies, offering investors exposure to a partially technology de-risked asset class without the need to stock-pick or commit management time.
target return
20% irr/ 3x capital (capital at risk)
why join?
track record & pipeline
first established in 1982, we have developed a deep ecosystem for investing in knowledge intensive companies.
our highly selective pipeline is sourced from a wide network of partners. each year we present only 60 of the 1,500 companies we screen to our investors.
you will become part of our 500-strong investor group which was just this year voted as the uk's #1 angel network. many of our investors are industry leaders and successful entrepreneurs with the experience to suggest they can help investee companies navigate their growth curves.
build an active or passive investment portfolio
active: come to our events, meet entrepreneurs and invest via our platform. we have a strong track record of connecting lead investors with potentially high growth companies.
passive: our funds invest in a selective and diversified portfolio representing less than 2% of the companies we have screened each year.
have a question?
get in touch with our team at: ventures@newable.co.uk
your capital is at risk if you invest in early stage companies. these investments may not be covered by the financial services compensation scheme. learn more about these risks

what we offer contact us important references
×
important
beware of scams using the names of nedbank limited, london branch or n.b.s.a. limited.
have you received an email, phone call or sms claiming to be from nedbank limited, london branch or n.b.s.a. limited inviting you to open an account or deposit large sums of money?
don’t let fraudsters trick you – nedbank limited, london branch or n.b.s.a. limited never contacts members of the public directly, and will never use email or text messages to ask you for your bank details or sensitive personal information.
we are aware of scams using our name and those of our staff. these are usually intended to convince you to send money to the scammers. we are also aware of fraudulent websites that are using our company information to look more authentic.
please be aware of these scams and stay vigilant.
london
nedbank corporate and investment banking london
nedbank london is one of the oldest foreign banks in the city, having been established in 1906.
what we offer
nedbank’s london branch hosts our investment banking, financing, advisory and markets businesses. we raise corporate deposits through a range of money market products and wholesale bank funding, and we price and trade fixed income instruments.
investment banking services
we cover advisory to corporate clients, debt and equity capital raisings, investing activities and provide specialised financing solutions in all sectors.
find out more
advisory
our corporate finance team is consistently ranked as one of the top three advisors in south africa. the team has extensive experience across all sectors of the economy, including mining and resources, telecommunications and construction.
find out more
markets
the markets franchise undertakes trading activities and provides trading products to institutional and corporate clients. activities are enabled by leading technology.
find out more
financing
from acquisition finance through export credit finance to project finance, we provide unique funding and debt solutions for large infrastructure, mining, energy related and telecommunications projects, structured trade and commodity finance-related transactions.
find out more
nedbank non-resident and embassy banking
while we don’t offer general retail banking services, we offer tailored financial solutions to diplomats and embassy officials, as well as non-residents through nedbank’s non-resident and embassy banking branch.
find out more
contact us
need assistance with your corporate and investment banking requirements, get in touch with our team of experts.

Nedbank London is one of the oldest foreign banks in the city, established in 1906. 
The bank offers various services, including investment banking, financing, advisory, and markets. 
Its services include debt and equity capital raisings, investing activities, and specialized financing solutions. 
The bank also provides tailored financial solutions to diplomats and embassy officials. 
Its teams cover sectors such as mining, telecommunications, and energy.

contract hire, car and van leasing special offers on all makes and models

please search online for our latest car and van leasing special offers or call us on 0203 761 0332 if you wish to discuss your specific requirements with one of our automotive consultants.
one stop shop for all your automotive finance and leasing requirements
if you are looking to finance or lease a new car or van, you may be unsure whether business contract hire or personal car leasing is the most cost effective and tax efficient way for you. we are therefore always happy to offer unbiased vehicle finance, contract hire and car leasing advice on the best way to fund your next new car or van.
whether you need assistance in managing an entire vehicle fleet or simply require a competitive quote for one vehicle, ileasing uk will be able to help.

asset backed investments	
our investment providers focus only on asset backed investments in the uk.
current offers returning up to 12% per annum can be paid quarterly / annually or rolled until the end of term.
security trustee	
all of the investments we source and compare have a security trustee in place.
the security trustees will act solely on behalf of investor and are fully independent of the investment provider.
no investor fees	
with investment opportunities there are no investor fees.
income is paid as stated and with full return of capital at term end. terms are typically between 1 to 5 years in length.
why investment opportunities?
we compare fixed interest rate investments offered by multiple providers in the uk to find the best that the market can offer.	
the investment opportunities website can offer all the information and tools you need to help you find the investments that best fit your preferred investment strategy and risk profile to get you started.
as an investor, you have many different options as to what, where and how you invest your money. nobody can ever predict with certainty which investments will perform the best, however at investment opportunities we do detailed research and due diligence into all of the investment opportunities we compare to make sure that we have all the latest information on the most promising opportunities that the uk market currently has to offer.
compare investments
key points
some key reasons why you should use investment opportunities
trustworthy
investment opportunities only work with trusted and respected investment providers within the united kingdom.
no fees
our service is 100% free and quick to use. simply complete the form and we send the results to you by email.
competitive rates
our investment providers have competitive rates better than those offered by traditional bank based investments.	
quick response
we will send details on the most suitable investment opportunities based on your choices to your email within 24 hours.	
compare the best investments now!
it only takes 30 seconds to complete the form and get started.
compare investments
faq's
who do you share my information with?
we will only share your information with 3rd parties who provide products that you may be interested in after using our comparison site. we will not sell or share your data with any other third parties and our partnered product providers are under strict agreement not to disclose your data to any other parties.
what kind of investments are available?
all of the opportunities to invest are with established uk companies with excellent track records, typically offering fixed rate bond investments in a variety of exciting uk projects that benefit from tax-efficient, high-yielding rates of return.
who are the investments suitable for?
we source and market carefully selected investment products which are suitable for qualified investors, such as high net worth individuals or self-certified sophisticated investors. our unique approach enables high net worth individuals and sophisticated investors to gain exclusive access to many exciting uk projects and benefit from tax-efficient, high-yielding rates of return.

we are an independent comparison website which acts as an information provider and introducer to companies offering fixed return investments in the uk. the information published on this website should be used for information purposes only. some of the investments we compare may not be covered by the financial services compensation scheme (fscs) or provide access to the financial ombudsman service (fos). should this be the case, then confirmation will be made clear in any comparison and investments information packs provided for these investments.

why do we ask for a signature?​
before you can access sensitive information, you are required to declare that you are a suitably qualified investor. if you are in any doubt as to whether you meet the requirements of the investor category, you should consult an authorised person specialising in advising on investments of the kind in question before proceeding. registering does not commit you to making any investment. to register, click on the appropriate statement then read and sign to confirm you agree to the declaration.

certificate for execution by self-certified sophisticated investors
i declare that i am a self-certified sophisticated investor for the purposes of the financial services and markets act (financial promotion) order 2005.
i understand that this means:
i can receive financial promotions that may not have been approved by a person authorised by the financial conduct authority;
the content of such financial promotions may not conform to rules issued by the financial conduct authority;
by signing this statement i may lose significant rights;
i may have no right to complain to either of the following:
the financial conduct authority; or
the financial ombudsman scheme;
i may have no right to seek compensation from the financial services compensation scheme.
i am a self-certified sophisticated investor because at least one of the following applies:
i am a member of a network or syndicate of business angels and have been so for at least the last six months prior to the date below;
i have made more than one investment in an unlisted company in the two years prior to the date below;
i am working, or have worked in the two years prior to the date below, in a professional capacity in the private equity sector, or in the provision of finance for small and medium enterprises;
i am currently, or have been in the two years prior to the date below, a director of a company with an annual turnover of at least £l million.
i accept that i can lose my property and other assets from making investment decisions based on financial promotions.
i am aware that it is open to me to seek advice from someone who specialises in advising on investments.
i agree

i understand that this means:
i can receive financial promotions that may not have been approved by a person authorised by the financial conduct authority;
the content of such financial promotions may not conform to rules issued by the financial conduct authority;
by signing this statement i may lose significant rights;
i may have no right to complain to either of the following:

the financial ombudsman scheme;
i may have no right to seek compensation from the financial services compensation scheme.
i am a certified high net worth individual because at least one of the following applies:
i had, during the financial year immediately preceding the date below, an annual income to the value of £100,000 or more;
i held, throughout the financial year immediately preceding the date below, net assets to the value of £250,000 or more. net assets for these purposes do not include:
the property which is my primary residence or any loan secured on that residence;
any rights of mine under a qualifying contract of insurance within the meaning of the
financial services and markets act 2000 (regulated activities) order 2001; or
any benefits (in the form of pensions or otherwise) which are payable on the termination of my service or on my death or retirement and to which i am (or my dependants are), or may be, entitled.
i accept that i can lose my property and other assets from making investment decisions based on financial promotions.

about us
union bank of india (uk) ltd is a wholly owned subsidiary of union bank of india, one of the largest & leading public sector bank in india.
union bank of india (uk) ltd is registered in england and wales in the year 2011 under registered company number 07653660, with its registered office at senator house, 85 queen victoria street, london, ec4v 4ab. union bank of india (uk) ltd has been authorised by the prudential regulation authority (pra) and regulated by the prudential regulation authority and the financial conduct authority (fca). the bank is registered in fca register in the year 2013 with financial services register number 601551. your deposits with union bank of india (uk) ltd are protected up to £85,000 per eligible person for single accounts and up to £170,000 for joint accounts by the financial services compensation scheme (fscs), the uk's deposit guarantee scheme. for further information please visit bank & savings protection checker | check your money is protected | fscs.
the parent bank (union bank of india) was established in the year 1919 and has its registered headquarters at mumbai, india. the government of india (goi) holds more than 80 (%) percent share in the parent bank. initiating major reforms in public sector banks (psbs) in india, a mega amalgamation exercise was taken up in financial year 2019-20. as a result of which, post amalgamation of parent bank, it became 5th largest psb in india with more than 9500 branches, 13300 plus atms, an employee strength of over 75000 and customer base of over 120 million.
parent bank has its presence in the world's major financial centres of hongkong, dubai, and sydney, as well as representative office at abu dhabi, banking joint venture in malaysia and a wholly owned subsidiary in london, uk. the parent bank is building value in international markets by meeting the banking requirement of corporate, cross-border lending and trade finance.
mr. rajkiran rai g.
chairman
mr. rajkiran rai g. is chairman of the bank since november, 2017 and managing director & ceo of union bank of india since july, 2017.
mr. rai has more than three decades of rich banking experience which includes heading industrial finance branch, regional offices and zonal offices. he started his banking career in 1986 as an agricultural finance officer in central bank of india, has the rich experience of heading various branches at different parts of the country for more than 17 years. on his elevation as general manager, he was given the responsibility of heading human resource development department. he was the field general manager of mumbai zone of central bank of india, when he was elevated to the post of executive director of oriental bank of commerce.
he holds chairmanship in many organisations some of which are indian bank's association (iba), union asset management company and star union dai-ichi life insurance company limited, etc. and director on the board of exim bank and oriental insurance company limited. earlier, he also served on the board of canara hsbc oriental bank of commerce life insurance co. ltd.
mr. rai is an agricultural science graduate and also a certified member of indian institute of bankers. he has been conferred honorary fellowship by indian institute of banking & finance (iibf) in recognition of his valuable contribution in the field of banking and finance.
mr kalyan varma
managing director & chief executive officer
mr kalyan varma, managing director & chief executive officer at union bank of india (uk) ltd since august, 2021 is a seasoned banker with rich banking experience. in more than one decade of industry know-how, his range of experiences span from application of operational aspects of conventions at grassroot, to administering and formulating policy blueprints at the executive stratum. he has grown through assuming responsibilities across the spectrum in business development and leadership. from handling key strategic assignments, industry-proficiency and competence. his industrial journey includes a range of responsibilities in bank's business development, starting from being a credit officer to heading large branches in india. mr. varma's demonstrated expertise in the field is coupled with his excellency in administrative roles with the parent bank as well as uk-subsidiary. his latest assignment with the parent bank was to lead the stressed asset resolution team at corporate office, (mumbai), in the capacity of assistant general manager.
a post graduate in science, and a certified associate of indian institute of bankers (caiib), mr. varma has also completed 'role of director' from institute of directors in uk.
dr anand kumar
non - executive director (ned)
dr anand kumar, non-executive director of union bank of india (uk) ltd. since july 2020. previously dr kumar is associated with the bank as ed & deputy ceo since july 2013. he is a senior banker with over three decades of banking experience in india, singapore and uk environments. prior to joining union bank of india (uk) ltd he had served bank of baroda uk as their retail banking and strategic initiatives head and earlier as the retail banking head at icici bank (uk) plc. he is credited with rolling out retail banking products such as e-banking, debit cards and online bonds in both the banks. dr kumar is a keen learner always updating himself of the developments. earlier he had served icici bank in india as regional head, chandigarh and zonal head, kolkata. he has also served as head-icici lombard general insurance (services) company limited in london, uk.
dr kumar is also now appointed as one of the directors at associations of foreign bankers (afb) of london, uk.
dr kumar is well qualified with an mba, llb and phd, he is a fellow of the chartered institute of security & investments, uk and an ica certified compliance awareness course and has been trained at manchester business school, manchester uk on managing financial services and 'role of a director' course with the institute of directors, uk.
mr. patrick quinn
independent non - executive director (ined)
mr. patrick quinn, independent non-executive director at union bank of india (uk) ltd, since june 2013 is a widely experienced international banker with over four decades of experience at senior level in investment and commercial banks. he is at the board of union bank of india (uk) ltd since last 9 years, also he has been in the board of an another international bank in the uk as a non-executive director for over 22 years and had served earlier as an executive director on the board of yamaichi bank (uk) ltd, a japanese bank. he also has experience of having served in various geographies including hong kong and usa. during his career he has had a strong record of business development, credit, administration and operations. mr quinn chairs the risk and compliance committee of the board.
mr quinn is an associate member of the chartered institute of bankers and an associate member of the british institute of management.
mr. john kerr
independent non - executive director (ined)
mr. john kerr, independent non-executive director at union bank of india (uk) ltd, since november 2013 is a highly experienced adaptable senior banker with exceptional compliance, risk management and audit skills. in his long banking career, he has served many international banks operating in the uk mainly as the head of their audit and compliance functions. his most recent stint was as head of internal audit and compliance at icbc (london) plc. from 2003 till february 2014 and had held the cf10 and cf11 (compliance and mlro) for the bank. prior to this he was internal auditor and compliance in charge at qatar national bank, london branch- 2001-03; internal audit manager at bank handlowy warszawie s.a, london branch - 1998-2001; and earlier with the midland bank plc/ hsbc group in various positions between 1970 to 1998. mr kerr heads the audit committee of the board.
mr kerr is a ba honours graduate and mba. he is also a member of the chartered institute of management.
mr. manas ranjan biswal
nominee director
mr manas ranjan biswal, nominee director at union bank of india (uk) ltd, since may, 2019. mr. biswal assumed the charge as executive director (ed) of union bank of india (parent bank) on march, 2019.
mr. biswal joined punjab national bank (pnb) in 1985 as a management trainee and prior to his elevation as executive director of union bank of india, he was appointed as general manager at the corporate office of the pnb. at corporate level, he has headed the credit monitoring and review division, recovery division, resolution and nclt division.
mr. biswal is a seasoned banker with over more than 3 decades of rich banking experience in various administrative and functional capacities at branches, regional offices, zonal offices and corporate office level. he has also worked for more than 3 years as ceo of a leading india psb's dubai branch and middle east operations and as zonal head of its eastern zone.
mr. biswal is a graduate in science and a certified associate of indian institute of bankers (caiib).

summary: Offers personal and corporate banking services, including savings accounts, loans, and internet banking.
explanation: I focused on the key services and products mentioned, omitting location and regulatory details.
clean_content:
Union Bank of India (UK) Ltd is a subsidiary of Union Bank of India. 
The bank offers various services, including personal and corporate banking, and provides products such as savings accounts, current accounts, and loans. 
The bank is regulated by the Prudential Regulation Authority and the Financial Conduct Authority. 
It has a presence in the UK and offers services such as internet banking and mobile banking. 
The bank's parent company, Union Bank of India, is a major public sector bank in India with a significant presence in the country's banking industry. 
The bank has a strong focus on customer service and provides support to its customers through various channels, including phone, email, and online banking. 
The bank's services cater to individuals, small businesses, and large corporations. 
The bank's website provides information on its products and services, as well as tools and resources for customers and non-customers alike.
label_description: Services related to financial advice, including investment advice, financial planning, and wealth management.

summary: Offers trading services, including CFDs, forex, and spread betting, with educational resources and customer support.
explanation: I focused on the company's services, including financial products and tools, to create a concise summary within the 20-word limit.
clean_content:
CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 48.98% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

The provider offers various services, including trading platforms, market analysis, and educational resources. They also provide information on their regulatory status and compliance with financial regulations.

The company is authorized and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) and is a member of the UK's Financial Ombudsman Service. They offer a range of financial products and services, including forex, CFDs, and spread betting.

Their services cater to different types of traders, from beginners to experienced professionals. They also provide customer support and educational resources to help traders make informed decisions.

The company emphasizes the importance of understanding the risks associated with trading and investing in financial markets. They also highlight the need for traders to carefully consider their financial situation and investment objectives before making any trading decisions.
label_description: Services related to financial advice, including investment advice, financial planning, and wealth management.

we develop trustees, strengthen boards and drive change for a better society.
we are trustees unlimited.
more about us
inspire list
the inspire list promotes the wide range of people already giving their time, skills and experiences for the benefit of charitable organisations.
this is the first initiative of the trustee diversity panel, which is supported by trustees unlimited.
we know that trustee boards aren’t diverse enough and one of the challenges is people from a wide range of backgrounds who are unable to see people like them represented as trustees.
however, as that picture slowly changes, our aim is to gather the profiles of people from black and ethnic minority backgrounds who are already serving on boards.
our services
becoming a trustee
becoming a trustee enables you to make a difference by using your professional and life experiences to benefit a cause you care about.

clean_content:
We are Trustees Unlimited, a social purpose business that aims to strengthen civil society by developing and supporting trustees and boards. 
We provide a range of services, including trustee recruitment, board development, and support for charities and organizations. 
Our goal is to help create a more diverse and effective charity sector by providing the right leadership and support.

the accountant that will make you successful....
r stride & co started trading in 1988 and is an independant accountant based in harrogate, north yorkshire. we have offices outside of the centre with our own car park, making visits for clients easy. we act for client not only in harrogate, but have a client base nationally and internationally.
we have a wide range of clients in every area of service industry, manufacturing and retail.
we do not employ secretarial staff, upon contact with our offices you will get a dedicated accountant answering the phone, who has all of your personal and business details instantly to hand to help you, to guide you and give you advice. we have people answering phone calls, not digital messages!
we are highly computerised, and this provides our clients with the best possible pro-active service.
robin stride (fmaat) ( ) and donna stride ( ) the senior partners in the firm with over 50 years experiance in the industry are supported by six dedicated staff members.
r stride & co is a trading name of r stride & co llp (limited liability partnership), company registered in england number oc 356030, registered office as above

research & development tax relief specialists
dawson christie is a specialist tax consultancy based in london. our mission is to help small and medium-sized enterprises (smes) across the uk claim the tax relief they are entitled to for undertaking research and development (r&d).
what you can claim
many smes don’t understand that they could be able to claim more than £50,000 in r&d tax relief, and as a result, uk smes are owed an estimated £84 billion in r&d tax relief. we aim to change that and get companies the money they are entitled to.
the consultancy manages r&d tax relief claims for smes in a wide variety of sectors – from manufacturing to education – that have carried out r&d in the uk.
tax specialists here for you
dawson christie’s team, which comprises chartered accountants, scientists, engineers and ex-her majesty’s revenue & customs (hmrc) inspectors, will handle your r&d tax relief claim from start to finish, including preparing a technical report and submitting it on your behalf to hmrc. we know what hmrc are looking for so we can ensure your claim is accurate and complete and therefore has the best chance of being successful.
in simple terms, we will do all the legwork for you in the claim process, enabling you to do what is most important – get on with running your business and ensuring it is maximising its profitability.

020 8050 3673

The consultancy manages R&D tax relief claims for SMEs across various sectors, including manufacturing and education. Their team, comprising chartered accountants, scientists, engineers, and former HMRC inspectors, handles the claim process from start to finish. about rowena griffiths
i have over 20 years experience in financial services, as an adviser and in management. i advise mainly on pensions and investments and a typical client would be someone planning for retirement or in retirement. i also help clients manage their investments, protect their families and mitigate against inheritance tax. i help people understand the complexities of financial products. i am a holistic financial planner, which involves first identifying a client’s financial goals and writing a plan based on their aims and to address any shortfalls.
although i don’t exclusively advise women, i do receive a lot of enquiries on divorce. also, ethical investments are becoming more and more popular.
i started advising clients in 1991 when i was working for a major high street bank. however, my first introduction to holistic financial planning was in 1994 when i joined a small division of prudential called private financial planning services. i was able to study hard and gained my advanced financial planning certificate, now known as ‘diploma status.’ this was one of the most enjoyable jobs i have held, as prudential has a strong brand and some excellent products. the main offering, however, was a financial planning service which reflected the clients’ goals and needs, rather than a recommendation of products to invest in.
in 2001 i was made redundant and decided to take a year off to travel the world. on my return, i was able to realise a longstanding ambition and become an independent financial adviser. i joined a company called sedgewicks, but left when they were taken over by barclays bank and lost their independent status. i have been with my present company for the last 8 years, offering the same independent advice, although the name above the door has changed a few times over the years!
i have been told by my clients that i add the most value by making complex and possibly daunting financial products understandable. i offer an initial meeting without cost or obligation.

acs partners
acs partners work with clients at a senior level to deliver business acquisition and divestment services, operational and financial restructuring and business improvement services to corporate clients, private shareholders, banks and private equity. as well as managing the acquisition or divestment process from target search through to deal completion we can assist in improving enterprise value through operational or financial restructuring and post acquisition can provide interim management or business integration services.
we are a small firm made up of a multi-disciplinary team of highly experienced business practitioners offering highly flexible, cost-effective solutions to shareholders, lenders and management. the acs team are proven and pragmatic business managers with an extensive range of industry experience. our approach is practical and aimed at delivering real value for clients.
our clients range from small smes and start ups to international corporates. we have worked with quoted companies, private equity backed investments, companies controlled by lenders and family-owned enterprises. through our international network of partner firms we are able to successfully execute projects across multiple international locations.

the mortgage process, whether you are looking for a buy to let, interest only, residential purchase or bridging finance solution (by referral only), your options have never been so accessible.
wealth management and pensions
pensions remain a highly effective and tax efficient method of retirement planning. using our pensions – consolidation and review processes, we can advise you on your options. with increased freedom of choice in the way you can spend your pension fund, we can help you navigate seemingly
complex decisions, to help you make your retirement work. we provide comprehensive and as needed creative investment advice to assess how your investments can best be optimised, restructured or better managed

top quality broker!
more than 8 months trading, have no problem, fast withdrawing profit to my bank account (it's about 1-2 days). brillant relationship managers, very honest, helpful support. very fast execution, very good services.
if you want a serious broker with serious regulation and the best safety of funds this is the spot.
opening of my account and upgrade to professional status went fast and smoothly. customer support is professional and helpful. execution and spread are excellent. i like the fact that blackwell is regulated broker.
