about the group
lighthouse is part of the quilter plc and is a diverse group of financial advisory firms, providing financial solutions tailored to meet clients’ needs, be they individual or corporate. we operate a business model which allows advisers and firms to select whether they want to offer independent or restricted advice and be supported accordingly.
whilst lighthouse have these solutions for all types of individuals and businesses; most of our financial planning will be provided by our restricted national side of the business – lighthouse financial advice. our initial complimentary consultations for consumers that request to be contacted will be managed by our client services team in woodingdean, and passed to a financial adviser in the local area. this allows us to serve our growing number of clients in the most efficient way and enables us to refer those who require more specialised independent advice, onto our network business.
how we are maintaining our advice service
we want to reassure you that we are committed to providing the best possible service to you during the outbreak of coronavirus.
while we have closed our offices until further notice, and have moved to full remote working, we are still very much ‘open for business’, although we will not be conducting face to face meetings.
we have strong business continuity processes in place, to ensure we are able to effectively service and support our clients at all times. and we also have the reassurance that comes from knowing we benefit from the support, expertise, and financial security of being part of quilter – a leading provider of advice, investments, and wealth management both in the uk and internationally.
we have taken immediate steps to ensure we can continue to support your needs, including:
all staff working from remote locations as necessary, using our secure and tested technology
making greater use of video conferencing tools to keep in contact with clients, colleagues and advisers
no business travel
office phone lines are being diverted so you can still get in touch
supporting colleagues to remain resilient through periods of altered working practices
as the situation continues to evolve we will keep adapting to the needs of our colleagues and you, our much valued clients.
if you have any questions or concerns regarding your investments please don’t hesitate to get in touch.

about us
our services
financial planning
introduction to financial planning
financial planning
professional financial planning is the process which aims to help you realise your ambitions - whatever they may be. as professional financial advisers we can help you make informed decisions about your financial future, in the short, medium and long term. you will almost certainly have goals of one kind or another - buying a home, starting a family, living abroad, perhaps retiring, but these have financial implications and leaving it to chance isn't an option. careful planning helps to turn you
read more
give us a call on 020 3371 3007 or drop us a message!
contact us today!

critical illnes
protection
there are events we can all face that have the potential to wreck lives and families. it’s a difficult issue to think about, but imagine the impact on you and your family should the main earner in your household die or become seriously ill. it may not happen to you – we hope it doesn’t – but it might. while there is no insurance that can prevent these things from happening, you can protect yourself and your family financially by making money available, should something unexpected happen.
read more

savings & investments
often, people save for a specific reason and it's usually the safest way to build up a pot of money. it’s less risky than investing, but it offers limited growth. the most you'll earn on the money you save is the interest added. saving is perfect for people who don’t want to take any risks with their money, and most savings accounts have easy access or are for a fixed term.
read more

business protection
every business needs to protect itself. for most businesses the most valuable asset it has is its people. without them, a company’s survival could be at serious risk. with that in mind we can help you take the right steps to protect your people and your business. after all, you already protect many of the important things that keep your business running smoothly, like property, fleets and stock. so you should also insure your most valuable assets: your staff and shareholders.
read more

mortgages
mortgages are loans which are intended to help buyers purchase residential property. when you take out a loan, the lender charges interest: the same is true of a mortgage. a mortgage is a ‘secured’ loan, which means that the loan is secured against the property being purchased until the mortgage is paid off. sources of residential mortgages include high street banks, building societies and other types of less well known financial institutions.

pensions
when you retire you still need food and shelter as an absolute minimum, but of course you will want to maintain the lifestyle to which you have become accustomed, so unless you can guarantee a large inheritance or windfall, then you need to provide yourself with a secure income for the rest of your life. a well prepared pension plan which is regularly reviewed should go some way to providing you with a reasonable level of income in your retirement.
read more
give us a call on 020 3371 3007 or drop us a message!
contact us today!
wealth management
introduction to wealth management
relationship management
trust information
lasting power of attorney
wills
wealth management
wealth, just like your health, must be carefully preserved. your assets need to be protected against the potential threats of erosion by taxation, the effects of inflation and investment risks. whatever your level of wealth, there is nothing wrong in making the decision to prepare a risk aversion strategy. risk aversion is a reasonable and prudent strategy for anyone who is sure that they already have ample assets to provide for themselves and their family into the future.
read more
give us a call on 020 3371 3007 or drop us a message!

taxation
most of us face being taxed on our income, our capital gains, and in some circumstances the value of our estate when we die. taxation can be very complicated and the rules, reliefs and allowances often change, so it is worth obtaining a clear grasp of how these taxes work by discussing with a professional adviser the most efficient way to arrange your finances.

welcome to fortis financial, financial advisers in london
the great joy of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about life's uncertainties, and our aim is to pave the way for a more secure financial future for you, your family and for businesses of all sizes.
you are the focus of our business: you, your life, your family, your future.
our understanding of your current financial situation is the keystone to the formulation of a financial plan which will meet your future needs. many people have goals and dreams, but a goal without a plan is just a wish... an achievable goal is a dream with a deadline.
so it all starts with listening. we listen to your needs, your hopes, your dreams, and we formulate a plan, which enables us to offer you clear, no-jargon advice on the most appropriate financial products for your personal circumstances.
this is the start of our journey together, to prepare the plan to meet your goals, to ensure that you, your family and your assets are protected, and to help you build a brighter, more secure future.
call us today on 020 3371 3007 or complete our short enquiry form by clicking on the form button below and we'll be pleased to help you.

i have known peter for many years and always found him enthusiastic, easy to deal with and very helpful. he has always helped me be more tax efficient than i would have been if i had tried to manage my wealth on my own. my wife and i recently had our first child and so peter also then helped us get in place some life and critical illness insurance to ensure that we would be left in a good financial position if anything were to happen to our health. peter then introduced us to freddie who helped us lock in a much better mortgage with great flexibility as we are looking to move to a new family home but had some delays.
j.f
i met with frederick from fortis because i wanted to explore the options for investing a lump sum. the first meeting we had was very thorough where frederick gained an understanding of my attitude to risk, this enabled him to find the right products for me to consider for investment. the reports that were produced were complicated to say the least but frederick and his team were on hand to explain these to me, so they made sense to me and i felt comfortable with proceeding to make an investment. i took my time to make decisions and at no time was i rushed or asked where i was in my decision.
g.d

a host on an internet protocol (ip) network. it measures the round-trip time for messages sent from the originating host to a destination computer that are echoed back to the source. ping lloydsbank.co.uk traceroute traceroute is a computer network diagnostic tool for displaying the route (path) and measuring transit delays of packets across an internet protocol (ip) network. the history of the route is recorded as the round-trip times of the packets received from each successive host (remote node) in the route (path); the sum of the mean times in each hop is a measure of the total time spent to establish the connection. traceroute proceeds unless all (three) sent packets are lost more than twice, then the connection is lost and the route cannot be evaluated. run summary: Issues banknotes and coins, regulates banks, maintains financial stability, provides liquidity, and sets monetary policy.
explanation: I focused on key economic activities and services mentioned in the text, omitting location details and condensing information into a concise summary.
clean_content:
The Bank of England is a central bank that maintains monetary stability, provides financial services, and ensures the stability of the financial system. 
It regulates and supervises banks, maintains the integrity of the financial system, and provides liquidity to the financial system. 
The bank issues banknotes and coins, manages foreign exchange reserves, and acts as a lender of last resort. 
It also sets monetary policy, maintains price stability, and promotes the development of the financial system. 
The bank is responsible for maintaining the stability of the financial system, regulating and supervising banks, and providing financial services to the government and other institutions.
label_description: Services related to banking, finance, insurance, and investment.

skott consulting
//////////
financial crime compliance is now a critical element of any firm’s operating model, driving the right culture and ways of working to protect individuals and organisations from fraud, money laundering, reputational damage and regulatory sanctions.
with the exponential increase in financial crime threats and regulatory requirements, it is essential that firms have the appropriate infrastructure in place to both counteract and respond to incidents or regulatory oversight.
skott consulting specialises in supporting clients to develop and implement cost effective risk based and proportionate, yet comprehensive control frameworks, remediating existing deficiencies, responding to incidents or deploying integrated financial crime projects across the firm. additionally, it can provide assurance assessments, training or other financial crime support as required.
skott consulting supports clients by working together to fully understand the firm’s risks and operating environment to meet their needs, whether as a stand-alone assignment, interim leadership or to supplement the firm’s existing capability.
our services
//////////
anti money laundering, counter terrorist financing & sanctions
bribery & corruption, fraud, corporates facilitating tax evasion & whistle blowing
intelligence and monitoring, investigations & incident response
assisting firms to ensure that they meet their regulatory requirements, in particular, the 4th money laundering regulations, fca financial crime handbook, jmlsg guidance and the sanctions environment. additionally, to prepare for the up-coming 5th & 6th money laundering regulations. design and implement financial crime target operating models (tom) and frameworks.
assisting firms to ensure that they meet their legislative requirements, in particular, the bribery act 2010, the criminal finances act 2017 (corporates facilitating tax evasion in the uk and overseas) and their respective regulatory guidance of six principles; proportionate procedures, top-level commitment, risk assessment, due diligence communication including training & monitoring and review. design and implement financial crime target operating models (tom) and frameworks.
assisting firms to develop their intelligence and monitoring systems and processes for early identification of threats or attacks. also, intelligence gathering, assessment and reporting adopting of the uk governments national intelligence model (nim) and best industry practice. if a threat has materialised, then assist in the incident assessment, response planning and investigation in accordance with uk law and industry best practice. design and implement intelligence operating models and frameworks.
including:
governance and control environment
policy, standards, process (re-engineering) and guidance
risk assessments and management
people, culture change and training
customer due diligence (cdd), enhanced due diligence (edd) and risk & transaction monitoring
intelligence, information, incident management and communications
training,design and deliver through various channels and individually styled from annual training to role specific
remediation of existing deficiencies
assurance, monitoring and board reporting
regulation change management and environmental screening

our experience

project one
we were engaged by a major uk investment company (£26b funds under management) to completely review and overhaul their pep and high-risk client framework. read more…
project two
we were engaged by a uk wealth management company (£100b of investments) separating from their parent company, to develop the financial crime framework across its group of five subsidiary financial firms involving multiple jurisdictions.

welcome to radley green
radley green is a specialist recruitment consultancy based on london's tottenham court road. our directors have over 20 years' experience placing high-calibre professionals into temporary, interim, contract and permanent roles in london and internationally.
as recruitment experts in accounting & finance we work with businesses of all sizes across the commerce & industry, banking, financial services, professional services and not for profit sectors and our client base ranges from smes through to blue chip multinationals.
our aim is to keep the recruitment process simple. we provide our clients and candidates with an open, honest, efficient and reliable service and work tirelessly to assist you in your job search or to fill your vacancy.

content:
ir35 consultancy services - wolf ir35 legal services
home
news
faq
contact
menu
home
news
faq
contact
we provide ir35 legal services
wolf removes and minimises the risk that businesses and corporations face in light of the forthcoming ir35 private sector legislative reforms. we’ve saved clients over £20m in the last year alone.
reducing costs and preserving tax efficiencies
our goal is to support and enable business to reduce legal and accounting costs at a time when cost-efficiency is crucial to economic success and recovery. we facilitate compliance and tax efficiencies that improve profitability.
legal team
our legal team have saved medium and large businesses over £20m in the past year alone. we understand entrepreneurship and encourage forensic tax compliance based on consistent and collaborative relationships with hmrc. our streamlined approach supports business in a sustainable and progressive way.
technological solutions
we utilise a combination of cutting-edge legal technology and legal counsel to ensure businesses can continue to benefit from the flexibility and cost-effectiveness of limited company contractors in a compliant and coherent way.
eliminating risk
wolf’s structured and corporate approach to risk management absorbs all of the administrative costs of utilising limited company contractors and maintaining best-in-class legal compliance. our solution ensures business can recover post-pandemic, and insures medium and large business against unnecessary risk from tax liabilities that ought not to vest in the limited company contractor’s end-client.
the wolf team
michael paulin
linkedin
(inner temple, 2007) is the founder of wolf ir35 legal services. michael is a leading tax and employment barrister who specialises in ir35, corporate tax, and hmrc dispute resolution.
michael has particular experience of corporate tax strategy as well as structured and long-term approaches to novel legal risks for entrepreneurial businesses.
he is a member of her majesty’s attorney general’s panel of counsel.
“michael has the ability to soothe clients both through his delivery and how he presents the way forward” (chambers and partners, 2020).
nicholas gilbey
has over twenty-five years experience in the technology industry. nic designed, built and maintained the award-winning investor relations and messaging software for ubs. he managed the development team for the beds (business engagement development system) for thomson reuters. he has run his own digital agency for over fifteen years and has worked as a technology consultant and produced web-based systems for bp, network rail and total.

contact us
open. committed. with integrity.	
built on principles of transparency, commitment and integrity, wtt brings together experienced tax, legal and finance professionals working together to develop robust defences to ongoing tax matters arising from the past and assisting you to ensure clarity in legally aware planning for the future.
who are wtt?
wtt provides award winning and experienced tax advisers, legal experts and finance professionals all under one roof. we work together to advise clients facing ongoing tax issues and looking to plan for a secure, legally compliant tax framework for the future.
guided by the principles of openness, clarity and integrity, we provide an innovative approach in what is often viewed as an opaque industry. with that in mind, wtt will work collaboratively with you to devise a tax strategy that achieves your longer-term goals and a clear plan to bring them into reality. we take care to ensure you understand our advice, because the ultimate decision is yours.
our aim is the provide the resolution and clarity you need so that you feel confident and empowered to take control of your tax, legal and financial affairs going forward.
whether you are a contractor, an individual or have a client who is facing tax issues with the hmrc, wtt is here to assist you. call us or fill in your details here and we’ll call you back. our initial consultation is free of charge.
how can wtt help?
wtt’s experienced professionals cover a broad range of practice areas and are on hand to discuss any requirements you may have.
wtt tax
utilising proven technical and commercial arguments, wtt is able offer you an impartial, straightforward review and assessment of the likely outcomes for your tax portfolio.
tax help
wtt legal
our team of lawyers deliver legal solutions which are integrated with the tax and financial advice given by wtt consulting. this allows us to offer a holistic approach to the provision of advice.
legal help
wtt big group
an action group of contractors, big group mobilises a collaborative voice to implement a challenge hmrc’s existing tax enquiries and ensure the sustainability of the freelancing profession.
wtt big group
faq's
how do i work most compliantly as a contractor with ir35 in mind?
the landscape for ir35 is constantly changing and with the introduction of ir35 into the public sector beginning in 2020, contractors must begin to prepare themselves. to begin you can visit our ir35 pages here which include our helpful videos on the matter
in addition, recent case law surrounding personal service companies shows that running a ltd company as a contractor is perhaps not the safe and compliant route it has typically been considered to be. to discuss the expected pitfalls and new legislation with a member of the team to ensure your future planning is compliant please contact us.
i’ve received a follower notice from hmrc and i don’t know what to do.
receiving a follower notice and apn is a shock for many. it may come out of the blue and indeed we have seen follower notices arrive after ten years of inaction by hmrc. dealing with the subsequent process does not need to be stressful and there are sometimes ways to challenge. you can find more information about challenging demands from hmrc here.
my client has an outstanding enquiry with hmrc, how much information should i give?
this will largely depend on the type of enquiry received. for example, if a s.9a has been received this is a more informal request for information and we can therefore be more selective about the questioning. conversely if a schedule 36 notice is received then failure to comply is met with penalties and so a fuller response is required to protect your client. it is recommended that you speak with one of our advisers who will be able to assist you further in drafting suitable responses and reviewing your drafts.
i want to challenge hmrc’s demands but don’t want to do it on my own.
depending on the demand you’ve received it is possible that wtt has already organised a group to defend hmrc’s assertion that tax is due. we currently manage groups of individuals defending tax demands from the following products, contractor loan arrangements, offshore tax structuring, film partnerships, enterprise investment schemes (eis), enterprise zones trusts (ezt’s), business premises renovation allowance schemes (bpra’s), property syndicates, share loss schemes, ebt’s and discounted security schemes.
it is therefore likely that wtt is already working with a group on your scheme and you should not fear challenging the demand alone. please contact us to find out more about our groups or find out more about challenging hmrc’s demands here.
my end client has given me a contract to sign that makes me liable if my ir35 status is challenged.
the continuous changes that we’re seeing in the ir35 arena is causing confusion for all parties which is leading to ill-drafted contracts seeking to protect positions which are not appropriate. wtt legal’s expert team spend significant time on contract negotiations between contractors and end-clients. for a no-obligation review of your contract please contact our legal team.
my scheme operator has demanded i repay a loan from years ago. what can i do?
it is becoming more and more common that trustees and scheme operators are recalling loans received many years ago in an effort to legitimise the schemes they marketed following new legislation and precedent. these demands can be terrifying, but commonly lack substance and can be defended easily. wtt has successfully defended a number of these demands to date and we are confident that we have arguments for the vast majority of contractor loan arrangements.
please contact us immediately if you receive a demand of this nature.
i’m unsure of my liability if i settle with hmrc, how do i work this out?
wtt offers potential clients a no-obligation review of their position which includes a free calculation of potential liability. to take up this opportunity please contact the team.

content:
wren capital
what we do
wren is an angel investor in science, engineering and software.
we founded wren in 2011 and have invested in over 60 companies so far.
wren is well known in the early stage investment community and has co-invested with a wide range of both angel and institutional investors.
what we look for
from software and semiconductors to genome editing, and from medical devices to satellites, we are interested in sectors where technical ingenuity and hard work can produce long term value.
we look for people with a deep understanding of their markets. the founders we invest in are smart, strategic, and flexible.
our investments
wren typically invests £50,000 to £200,000 per funding round.
difficult problems take time to solve, so we're patient with our investments.
our aim is to get deals done and we take a pragmatic approach to doing so.
our people
rajat malhotra
rajat is the 2013 uk angel investor of the year and the managing partner of wren.
prior to co-founding wren, rajat was a competition lawyer in both london and brussels.
richard cameron
richard is a co-founder of wren capital.
his personal and professional interests include mathematics, statistics, and computer science.
contact
if you have a proposal that you think we'd be interested in, please email us a summary to summaries@wrencapital.co.uk
our phone number is 020 3397 3390, and our contact email address is contact@wrencapital.co.uk

talentedge and our sister agency talentarc specialise in providing recruitment solutions for the tech, media and consumer sectors. we have placed thousands of finance and technology candidates into permanent, interim and project roles. talentarc work on c-suite and director level positions across general management, finance, technology, operations and m&a. our clients range from vc/pe backed startups to globally recognised brands across the uk and internationally.

marketing analysis & insight
we have qualified consultants using specialist technology who provide additional services that enhance your hiring, retention and people performance.
profiling
we can provide comprehensive profiles and reports on applicant or current employee personality and aptitudes, covering working style, strengths, and weaknesses. you can use this insight to develop effective approaches to managing them and to gain a better understanding of your team’s dynamics.
market mapping
detailed market analysis to support our clients in reviewing their senior talent. bespoke reports typically focus on: competitors and comparative sectors; identifying skill gaps; providing insight on entering new markets/launching new divisions and ultimately ensuring their top talent is retained or hired.
bench marking
we provide research and analysis on specific roles or teams vs the relevant benchmark market, sub-sector or competitor companies. get in touch if you would like to arrange for us to produce a bench marking report on your current team or future hires.
team analysis
consultation on team fit; identifying areas of strength and potential gaps; providing recommendations for management style and future hires.

summary: Offers bespoke investment strategies, liquidity solutions, and UCITS funds, dedicated to responsible investing and net-zero greenhouse gas emissions.
explanation: I focused on the company's economic activities, services, and goals, omitting location and extraneous details, to create a concise summary within the 20-word limit.
clean_content:
Asset Management One Co., Ltd. is a leading Japanese asset management company with $524 billion in assets under management. 
The company offers bespoke investment strategies and liquidity solutions. 
Asset Management One International Ltd. provides investment strategies to institutional clients and is dedicated to responsible investing. 
The company's purpose is to create long-term value for its clients and stakeholders. 
Asset Management One Co., Ltd. is committed to achieving net-zero greenhouse gas emissions and has set an interim goal to achieve this. 
The company offers a range of investment products and services, including UCITS funds, and has a global presence with offices in key financial centers.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

summary: Money transfer software for businesses, offering customizable, secure, and efficient transaction management, with real-time processing and integrations.
explanation: I focused on the main service, key features, and benefits, omitting location and company name, to create a concise summary.
clean_content:
Our money transfer software provides a comprehensive solution for businesses, allowing them to run their money transfer services efficiently. 
The software offers a customizable and branded experience, with features such as a user-friendly interface, automated processes, and robust security measures. 
It also includes tools for managing transactions, tracking customer activity, and preventing money laundering. 
The system is designed to be flexible and adaptable, with the ability to integrate with various payment systems and third-party services. 
Key features include a mobile app, customer portal, and real-time transaction processing. 
The software is designed to help businesses streamline their operations, improve customer satisfaction, and reduce costs. 
It also offers a range of benefits, including increased efficiency, improved security, and enhanced customer experience. 
Our software provides a comprehensive solution for money transfer businesses, enabling them to manage their operations effectively and efficiently.

important
beware of scams using the names of nedbank limited, london branch or n.b.s.a. limited.
have you received an email, phone call or sms claiming to be from nedbank limited, london branch or n.b.s.a. limited inviting you to open an account or deposit large sums of money?
don’t let fraudsters trick you – nedbank limited, london branch or n.b.s.a. limited never contacts members of the public directly, and will never use email or text messages to ask you for your bank details or sensitive personal information.
we are aware of scams using our name and those of our staff. these are usually intended to convince you to send money to the scammers. we are also aware of fraudulent websites that are using our company information to look more authentic.
please be aware of these scams and stay vigilant.
london
nedbank corporate and investment banking london
nedbank london is one of the oldest foreign banks in the city, having been established in 1906.
what we offer
nedbank’s london branch hosts our investment banking, financing, advisory and markets businesses. we raise corporate deposits through a range of money market products and wholesale bank funding, and we price and trade fixed income instruments.
investment banking services
we cover advisory to corporate clients, debt and equity capital raisings, investing activities and provide specialised financing solutions in all sectors.
find out more
advisory
our corporate finance team is consistently ranked as one of the top three advisors in south africa. the team has extensive experience across all sectors of the economy, including mining and resources, telecommunications and construction.
find out more
markets
the markets franchise undertakes trading activities and provides trading products to institutional and corporate clients. activities are enabled by leading technology.
find out more
financing
from acquisition finance through export credit finance to project finance, we provide unique funding and debt solutions for large infrastructure, mining, energy related and telecommunications projects, structured trade and commodity finance-related transactions.
find out more
nedbank non-resident and embassy banking
while we don’t offer general retail banking services, we offer tailored financial solutions to diplomats and embassy officials, as well as non-residents through nedbank’s non-resident and embassy banking branch.

content:
magnesium financial management llp : introducing the healthcare specialist finance network
magnesium financial management provides high quality financial skills to ambitious and growing enterprises. clients have been from healthcare, internet services, recruitment services, food retailing and investment management sectors. its partners have 20 years combined experience in working directly with clients.
finance directors for the healthcare sector
to provide specialist financial management to the economically important healthcare sector, magnesium is also working with an independent network of financial directors/controllers who are each highly experienced in the sector.
the network provides cost-effective financial management solutions to clients on an ‘as needed’ basis, taking on either a part-time or a more full-time interim role in your business.
a member of the network will quickly become a key member of your business and will lead, support and implement the planning and delivery of robust financial solutions in areas such as raising finance, evaluating and implementing strategic transactions including m&a, financial reporting, cash management, budgeting, forecasting and strategic planning. their experience also means that they are able to contribute effectively in areas such as legal, hr and operations.
with expert knowledge of the financial challenges facing fast growth enterprises, members of the network are resourceful, professional individuals who are customer-focused and able to communicate with confidence across all disciplines.
the network would be delighted to discuss your needs and requirements with you. please contact any member of the network through the contact details under "the network" above for a free initial consultation. thank you.

livefree relies on a unique products & services portfolio, that provides its customers with different options that suits every taste and need, such as discounts memberships packages, online hotel booking, telecommunication services, airline services, in addition to a collection of products and services from various categories & various brands. all of this differentiates livefree from from any other e-commerce and direct selling company and make it on top.

LiveFree is a direct selling and e-commerce company that aims to provide a range of products and services. 
The company started in May 2013 with the goal of becoming a leading e-commerce and direct selling company. 
It offers a variety of products, including health and beauty items, electronics, and more. 
LiveFree also provides entrepreneurship opportunities and has a unique approach to sales and marketing. 
The company has offices in several locations, including London, Abu Dhabi, and Cairo.

summary: Provides qualifications, technical resources, events, and networking opportunities for claims professionals.
explanation: I focused on the main services offered, including qualifications, resources, events, and networking, to concisely describe the business's activities.
clean_content:
The Chartered Institute of Loss Adjusters (CILA) is a globally recognised membership organisation for claims professionals. 
CILA offers various qualifications to support claims professionals in each stage of their career. 
The institute provides a range of benefits, including technical resources, events, and networking opportunities. 
CILA's members can access online courses, technical libraries, and advice on professional development. 
The organisation also offers guidance on claims handling, ethics, and best practices. 
CILA has a strong focus on professional development, with a range of resources available to support members' career progression. 
The institute is committed to promoting high standards of claims handling and providing support to its members.

home
october 6, 2015 by stephensit
experts in business, not just accounting
helping you maximise profits and minimise inefficiencies
- annual business reviews as standard
-	no unexpected fees; fixed monthly billing
-	specialist advice whenever you need it
the new age of accounting
your finances at your fingertips, anytime, anywhere
-	cloud accounting gives you access to your finances 24/7
-	outsource your operations to us, we'll ensure things run smoothly
-	move your business in the right direction, we focus on the future
specialists in all things tax
we're much more than just tax returns
-	structure your business to increase profits and improve cash flow
-	make your business more attractive to investors through eis/seis
-	here to assist and file your vat and corporation tax returns
r&d claims, budgets, forecasts and business plans
as well as understanding how the business has performed historically, it’s crucial to appreciate where you are heading. we can map out what the next few years are going to look like and work together to smash every target. perhaps more importantly, we’ll help you to truly understand your cash flow and identify future shortfalls. as the old adage goes, cash is king!
find out more
taxation advisory services
taxation is a key yet daunting area for any small business. one wrong step can lead to headaches, lost reliefs and worst of all, phonecalls with hmrc. with leap in your corner, all this goes away. we’ll ensure you maximise reliefs and minimise the dreaded tax bill. we’ll also ensure everything is filed in a timely manner.
find out more
statutory and management accounting
the financials of any business tell a story but all too often no-one gets to hear it. our management accounts will provide a better understanding of what is driving your profits and maybe whats slowing it down. armed with this, you can focus on growing the business while we get your statutory accounts filed.
find out more
operations & processes
from bookkeeping and expense management to payroll and invoicing, leap provides the key processes to ensure your business runs smoothly and efficiently. time is perhaps the most underrated resource of any small business. leap will bring it to you by the bucket load.
find out more
business development & corporate finance
running a business is a journey from start-up to exit and we want to join you. we’ll be available at every step to advise and guide you on the key choices that will impact the future of your business. from raising new finance to selling your business, we know our stuff.
find out more
the cloud is the future
time is perhaps the most valuable resource of any sme and it should not be wasted. hours spent processing transactions are hours not spent focused on the strategy of your business. cloud accounting software minimises manual tasks and provides valuable insight to understand the past and make better decisions for the future.
no two businesses are the same and cloud-based solutions recognise this. through the integration of third-party apps, we can help you design a finance function to provide the services you need and avoid paying for the ones you don’t. debtors slow to pay? we have an app to help. want to better understand what’s driving your sales? there’s an app for that too.
the world is digitalising and your business shouldn’t be any different. ditch your archaic system and join the cloud today.
why us?
at leap accounts & outsourcing, we believe the days of the old-fashioned accountant are over. no more should your accountant turn up once a year to hand you a set of accounts for signing and an invoice for paying. in today’s modern age, an accountant should be pro-active and forward looking, helping you to identify areas in which your business can perform better.
leap is not an old-fashioned accountant. we don’t just want to help you meet deadlines… we want to work with you to help your business grow.
an all too common complaint from small business’s is that they only hear from their accountant when a deadline is looming. not us. we provide a business health-check every six months for all clients to review how the business is performing and how we can help it improve. and if an unexpected tax issue arises or you’re thinking about raising some cash to expand? we are always available to lend an ear and offer practical, effective solutions. we believe clients should pay for the value we provide, not for how long we spend on the phone to you.
request a call back
would you like to speak to one of our advisers over the phone? just submit your details and we’ll be in touch shortly. you can also email us if you would prefer.
do you have questions about how leap can help your company? send us an email and we’ll get in touch shortly, or phone us on 020 3290 7302 — we would be delighted to speak to you.
note: your details are kept strictly confidential as per our privacy policy.

We offer various services, including R&D claims, budgets, forecasts, and business plans,

Our goal is to provide proactive support, helping clients achieve their objectives.

Our approach prioritizes understanding each client's unique needs and challenges. 
We aim to build long-term relationships, providing ongoing support and advice. 
Our services are designed to help businesses grow and succeed.

your financial plan starts here
find out more
expert advice that starts with a free consultation
we offer a complimentary meeting where we will discuss your personal situation. our objective is to understand your aims and aspirations and to identify where you might need help in achieving your financial goals or managing your financial assets.
find out more
who are barker poland?
barker poland is a firm of professional financial planners and wealth managers whose aim is to provide our clients with high quality advice on all money related matters and build long-standing relationships. we are big on service, mindful of costs and like to keep things as simple as possible.
find out more
what do we do?
in short, we help you plan your financial future. as you go through life, your objectives change, there is always a milestone to aim for – whether this is putting money aside for future events, protecting your family or planning for retirement. whatever stage you are at, we can help you plan and implement a strategy that will help you to achieve your goals.
find out more
services
there are two key aspects to our services – financial planning and investment management - and we provide both on an ongoing basis for a single charge (see our fees page for further information).
financial planning focusses on designing and implementing a financial plan, taking account of your current financial position and objectives.
investment management concerns the on-going management of your assets, using our technical knowledge of investments and tax planning to ensure your assets are working as hard as they can for you and remain on course to meet your investment goals.

eck bookkeeping and accounts
meet elizabeth kelly (maat, bsc)
founder, director and bookkeeper
i love numbers… and cats. you may well have already realised that from seeing felines featured on our web pages! my three furry friends are typically close by while i am doing all my bookkeeping and accounting work.
i have been in bookkeeping and accounts roles for many years, and running my own business since 2014. so i know what it is like to be a business owner and bookkeeper for self-employed and limited company situations.
i have a real passion for guiding people through their accounts so that they have a better understanding of the financial status of their business. i always turn accountancy speak into plain english and i’m known for my patience and supportive nature.
it’s always so rewarding to see the relief on my clients’ faces when they know they can trust us to take care of everything, while they get on with doing the jobs they love and get paid for!
here are a few of my credentials:
aat qualified accountant technician and bookkeeper
make tax digital ready
certified expert in quickbooks online (advanced)
certified xero advisor
certified for xero payroll
expert in receiptbank app
experienced with freeagent
eck bookkeeping and accounts is typically engaged to be a bookkeeper for self-employed workers, small businesses and individuals earning a rental income as a landlord.
we’re based in eastbourne serving start-up and established businesses in the surrounding area, including hastings, seaford and uckfield in east sussex. as a result of recommendations we also have customers in kent and further afield.
our services include bookkeeping, company formation and annual accounts, vat, payroll, cis and tax returns.
as bookkeepers for busy self-employed people, who often don’t like the accounts side of things, we’re confident we can help you no matter what the current status of your bookkeeping – we’ve seen it all!
contact us
see reviews
we use cloud accounting platforms such as xero, freeagent and quickbooks, as well as desktop accounting packages and spreadsheet-based software.
eck bookkeeping is an outstanding firm who provide excellent accountancy support and guidance. whether you are looking for a bookkeeper as a self-employed person, a small business or landlord, nothing is too much for eck bookkeeping who often go above and beyond. they are really knowledgeable in all the different packages including xero, quickbooks and receipt bank.
stephen holt – ceo, eastbourne business improvement district (bid) – eastbourne, east sussex

quick start dynamics 365 business central
a powerful & encompassing all-in-one business management solution that can help to transform the way your business works. here at advantage, we can get your business up and running on dynamics 365 business central in the quickest possible time.
contact our dynamics 365 business central experts today
contact today
what is quick start dynamics 365 business central?
our quick start dynamics 365 business central provides your business with a comprehensive all-in-one business management solution or an upgrade on your existing erp/accounting system that's simple to use, easy to adapt to similar to that of dynamics nav but from within the cloud or on premise depending on your requirements. suitable for smes, dynamics 365 business central will give you all the tools you need to be able to manage your finances, operations, sales and customer service functions from within one place.
furthermore, a quick start dynamics 365 business central solution will enable your business to join all your systems together as well as providing you with the opportunity to improve efficiency through the use of automated tasks and workflows all from within your office 365 tools such as word, outlook, excel, flow and teams.
start your quick start dynamics 365 business central journey with advantage
our quick start dynamics 365 business central saas package solution is available from £6 per user per month and can be implemented from £6,000*. this package will include the following activities:
1) financial management
single company setup based on advantage “best practice” template
general ledger
custom chart of accounts (rapid start templates supplied with instructions)
g/l account categories and subcategories
g/l account extended texts
balance sheet and income statement reporting
account schedule reporting
dimension analysis (profit and cost centres)
budgeting
workflows for business processes such as approvals
cashflow management & forecasting
recurring and reversing journals such as general, cash receipts and payments.
1 additional g/l reporting currency
cash management
bank accounts
bank account reconciliations
bank integration – cash receipt & statement import / payment export
payment reconciliations and registrations
multi-currency for sales ledger, purchase ledger and automated exchange rate updates
currency revaluation for bank and open sales/purchase entries (gl revaluation available as additional abs module)
other
standard vat reporting, vat returns and hmrc integration (mtd)
g/l, sales ledger & purchase ledger opening balances imported
outlook integration
excel integration
document emailing (invoices, order confirmations, quotes, purchase orders, remittances)
users and security permissions
enhanced document layouts
system audit trails
2) sales management
sales invoicing
sales proformas & prepayments
sales approvals (quote/order/return order/invoice/credit)
payment terms with calculated discounts
receivables management
3) purchasing management
purchase invoicing
purchase approvals (quote/order/return order/invoice/credit)
payables management
*any customisations to the above packages will incur an additional cost.
please note: our quick start dynamics 365 business central packages may not be right for all businesses. if you are looking for a more tailored dynamics 365 business central package to meet your specific business requirements, then please get in touch with our team today by calling the below number or filling out our contact form. .

clean_content:
Green Rock Consulting offers a full recruitment service for accounting, business analyst, and investment analyst roles. They partner with employers and collaborate to find and hire talented professionals. They also assist job seekers in fast-tracking their careers by giving them access to mentorship and work experience programs designed to develop their skills and get them ready for employment.

The company provides a sector-focused approach to recruitment, helping employers find the right candidates and job seekers find employment. They offer a range of services, including mentorship and work experience programs, to help individuals develop their skills and increase their chances of finding employment.

Green Rock Consulting is committed to delivering high-quality recruitment services and has received recognition for its efforts. The company is accredited by REC and has achieved a 100% compliance score. They are also accredited by Fair Train and have received a gold standard award.

The company's services include helping employers find and hire talented professionals, as well as assisting job seekers in finding employment. They offer a range of programs and services designed to help individuals develop their skills and increase their chances of finding employment.

Green Rock Consulting's goal is to provide a high-quality recruitment service that meets the needs of both employers and job seekers. They strive to deliver exceptional results and provide a valuable service to their clients.
label_description: Recruitment services for finance, accounting, and banking.

fort capital solutions – capital market financing and execution solution

fort capital solutions
capital market financing and execution solution
home

home
about us
solutions
team
contact us
© 2021 fort capital solutions
who we are
fort capital solutions brings together a complete capital market financing and execution solution under one roof. we cover both the traditional and digital securities providing strategic, operational and organisational services.
we combine a wealth of knowledge and experience from traditional capital markets with unparalleled expertise in project management in the digital asset sector. we have proven working experience in fund management, alternative assets (venture capital and private equity), real estate, equities, derivatives and fixed income sectors.
fort capital solutions focuses on high potential projects and companies in the uk and europe, as well as sustainable large infrastructure projects in the developing world. our diverse clients range from small start-ups to large corporations.
what we do
fort capital solutions guides corporations through the complete
capital market cycle for both traditional and digital securities.
we leverage in-house capabilities and partnerships to provide a range of listing, transactional, fundraising and arranging services to our clients. in addition, we offer flexibility, experience and hands-on project management.
we pride ourselves on the quality and integrity of our work. our proposition is based on:
expertise: with a combined 100 years of experience in investment banking, we have comprehensive traditional capital market knowledge. fort capital solutions has also been instrumental in a number of digital securities initiatives.
flexibility: fort capital solutions prioritizes our client’s interests to pinpoint the most optimal solution. as such, we execute projects and mandates on a bespoke basis over predetermined models.
integrity: we maintain objectivity, provide our genuine point of view and clarity on subjects outside our domain of expertise
reputation: building relationships is key to our success. we focus significant attention, understanding and problem solving to execute projects with our clients.
solutions
initial analysis
initial evaluation and due diligence
assess the financing needs and robustness of the project/company
investor due diligence and kyc onboarding
ensure investor suitability, compliance and kyc protocols
research
generate original research, define and challenge the core value proposition
structuring & capital raising
private placement marketing and capital raising
conduct in-depth research and produce investor ready marketing collaterals. assess appetite, identify and contact potential investors, assist in transaction closing
financing solutions and term sheet negotiations
assist in the selection of the appropriate financing structure
digital assets
evolution of regulated digital assets in global securities markets
transactional & post-market
listing on a stock exchange
access to regulated digital exchanges
secondary market access and post transaction management
offer client access to global markets and products and provide a secondary market
project management services
act as a unique point of contact between all counterparties involved (regulatory, legal, technology) in order to ensure successful project launch
team
philip young, ceo
philip’s investment career began 25 years ago in london as an equity and derivatives salesman, then proprietary trader. he subsequently spent a decade in investment management, initially as an analyst for a hedge fund in tokyo, then as an investment committee member for an emerging market private equity firm based in hong kong, mumbai, dubai and london. philip was part of the founding management team that established the gibraltar stock exchange in 2012.
peter romilly, director
peter’s career began as a futures broker in 1987, becoming exposed to a wide range of on-exchange and otc investment instruments. he began to specialise in fx, running a derivatives market-making desk for a european bank. as the fx market moved online, peter moved more into the risk management and operations side. at fort capital solutions, he is responsible for compliance and operations.

clean_content:
Fort Capital Solutions brings together a complete capital market financing and execution solution under one roof. They cover both traditional and digital securities, providing strategic, operational, and organizational services. 

The company combines a wealth of knowledge and experience from traditional capital markets with unparalleled expertise in project management in the digital asset sector. They have proven working experience in fund management, alternative assets, real estate, equities, derivatives, and fixed income sectors.

Fort Capital Solutions focuses on high-potential projects and companies, as well as sustainable large infrastructure projects. They guide corporations through the complete capital market cycle for both traditional and digital securities.

Their services include initial analysis, investor due diligence, research, structuring, and capital raising. They also offer project management, transactional, and post-transactional services.

The company prioritizes clients' interests, pinpointing optimal solutions and executing projects with bespoke approaches. They pride themselves on expertise, flexibility, and integrity.

we are based in london. we are set up to provide our services, after initial meeting, mainly via the internet and by phone. this is really to give best use of time and thus allow us to offer good services at very competitive prices. however we do believe in the importance of meeting in person initially and at stages during the work.
we can help you with accounting, tax advice, business advice, plus the essentials to run the business and comply with rules: bookkeeping, filing accounts and tax returns, vat returns and monthly reporting.
we have great experience in all areas of tax and accounting and can give specialised advice in:
landlord tax returns
french expatriates
tax saving for small businesses
forward tax plannning
retirement planning
small businesses

summary: Accounting, tax, and business advisory services including bookkeeping, VAT, self-assessment, and tax refund services.
explanation: I focused on the specific services and economic activities mentioned in the input text.
clean_content:
We are a firm that provides accounting and tax services. 
We can help with accounting, tax advice, business advice, bookkeeping, filing accounts and tax returns, VAT returns, and monthly reporting. 
Our services include self-assessment tax returns, self-employed accounts, subcontractors' accounts and tax returns, business start-up advice, rental accounts, VAT returns and registration, capital gains tax calculations, and advice on trading as a limited company or sole trader. 
We also provide tax refund services, advice on pensioner taxation, and bookkeeping services. 
Our goal is to help businesses and individuals solve their problems and prosper.
label_description: Services related to financial record-keeping, accounting, and bookkeeping.

content:
ballamy | forensic accountants in london
loading
main menu
skip to primary content skip to secondary content
home
what we do
about us
ballamy llp is a firm of forensic accountants. we perform financial and regulatory investigations and provide expert evidence and litigation support services. our expertise and experience enable us to bring clarity to the most complicated financial situations. our clients receive advice, analyses and reports of the highest quality. our principal clients include leading law firms, barristers, regulatory bodies and multinational businesses.
what we do
we have many years of experience of preparing expert reports and of giving expert evidence in the uk’s civil and criminal courts. matters on which we give expert opinions include:
accounting treatments designed to conceal wrongdoing;
financial reporting under ifrs and uk gaap;
revenue recognition;
the meaning of realised profits under uk gaap;
solvency and going concern;
the quantification of losses, and
the valuation of shareholdings and businesses.
we have considerable experience of performing investigations in the regulatory, civil and criminal arenas. we investigate suspicions of:
non-compliant conduct by regulated persons and businesses;
bribery and corruption;
false accounting and fraudulent trading;
market abuse and insider dealing;
money laundering; and
misappropriations of assets.
ballamy llp has been appointed by the financial conduct authority to its forensic accounting framework as one of a small number of specialists to assist the fca’s enforcement division in conducting investigations into suspected misconduct and compliance failures.
mark ballamy
mark, the founder of ballamy llp, has more than 30 years’ experience of providing forensic accounting services. he is experienced in the preparation of expert reports and in giving expert evidence in court. mark is a fellow of the institute of chartered accountants in england and wales (“icaew”) and a member of the academy of experts. he is an icaew-accredited forensic accountant and an accredited accountant expert witness.
tel: 020 3705 9946
email: mark@ballamy.co.uk
mark ballamy’s cv 2021
85 gresham street
london
ec2v 7nq
020 3705 9945
summary: Forensic accountants providing expert evidence, financial investigations, and litigation support services.
explanation: I focused on the key services and activities mentioned, condensing them into a concise summary that captures the essence of the business's economic activities.
clean_content:
Ballamy LLP is a firm of forensic accountants. They perform financial and regulatory investigations and provide expert evidence and litigation support services. Their expertise and experience enable them to bring clarity to complicated financial situations. 
They have years of experience in preparing expert reports and giving expert evidence in UK courts. They investigate suspicions of non-compliant conduct, bribery, false accounting, market abuse, and money laundering. 
Their services include providing advice, analyses, and reports of high quality. They work with leading law firms, barristers, regulatory bodies, and multinational businesses.

content:
acuitas advisory - acuitas advisory
select page
enabling transformational growth through targeted acquisition
we are the specialists in providing clients with transformational growth opportunities within the global insurance and reinsurance markets. giving unparalleled access to potential new revenue streams, we support you in the execution of your strategic development plans.
we have been involved in some of the most high-profile market moves of recent years, and have a proven track record of delivering solutions discreetly and efficiently by way of:
the introduction of high-performing producers and business leaders
the transitioning of market-leading specialty teams and business units
the origination of m&a opportunities across niche and specialty lines
search
in a world where capital is available to all, claims are outsourced and it systems interchangeable, the key to growth is offering something different. make talent your differentiator and your people become your assets.
our research led methodology and unparalleled market interaction enable us to give incisive, exclusive access to the leading production-focused talent across the sector.
teams
even the best individual talent can only effect a finite amount of new client opportunities. acquiring a “group of individuals” can deliver transformative growth and should be considered as a more surgical approach to your m&a activity.
we have proven experience of delivering legally complex group opportunities, and have successfully transitioned numerous teams and business units with no legal recourse.
m&a
in an environment where technology is driving change at an unprecedented rate, business leaders have a rapidly diminishing window of opportunity to innovate and transform. when considering whether to build or buy, understand that acquisition can be the most effective way to achieve this evolution.
our network is extensive and our deal origination ability unrivalled in this space, make us a key part of your m&a strategy.
phone
+44 (0)20 7993 8717
email
info@acuitasadvisory.co.uk
address
new london street, 6 london house, london, ec3r 7lp

We are specialists in providing clients with transformational growth opportunities within the global insurance and reinsurance markets. 
We give unparalleled access to potential new revenue streams, supporting the execution of strategic development plans. 
Our approach includes introducing high-performing producers and business leaders, transitioning market-leading specialty teams and business units, and originating M&A opportunities across niche and specialty lines. 
Our research-led methodology and market interaction enable us to provide incisive, exclusive access to leading production-focused talent. 
We help clients achieve growth through targeted acquisitions, team transitions, and M&A strategies.

The company offers various services, including stock research, investing guides, and financial news.

They also provide resources for investors, including investing guides, tutorials, and webinars. 
The Motley Fool aims to help individuals achieve their long-term financial goals through informed investing.

Their goal is to empower individual investors to make informed decisions and achieve their financial goals.

clean_content:
We deliver actionable intelligence on a global scale, empowering informed decision making for insurance and commercial clients across the world. 
We are best known for our pioneering use of satellite, aerial and drone imagery analysis in commercial workflows, but our intelligence solutions are based on far more than imagery alone. 
We curate geospatial data from space and the ground to create actionable intelligence. 
Advanced data science techniques then apply this to individual sites or entire risk portfolios to improve the accuracy of financial exposure data by up to 93%. 
Our services include consultancy, training, and insights, providing solutions such as investigating complex property, business interruption and liability coverage and defence claims, 
and delivering cutting-edge intelligence techniques.

we pride ourselves on good customer service. we will support you every step of the way when setting up your policy and when you need to make a claim. in the unfortunate event that you do need to claim, we will be with you throughout the entire process to make it hassle-free for you.
we have a full suite of cover from horseboxes, 4×4 towing and horse transporter cover to riding schools, clubs and equestrians centres. we also have a range of liability cover, as well as more general horse and pony insurance. we can cater for your needs and tailor our policies to suit you. as a broker, we have access to some great rates through our relationships with the insurers. that means we are able to shop the market on your behalf to find you a great price.
horsebox insurance are part of the county group, one of the uk’s top 25 brokers.
the county group are part of global risk partners limited (grp), one of the uk’s largest independent insurance intermediary groups. grp comprises a national network of personal, sme and middle market insurance brokers, leading lloyd’s and london market insurance brokers, and an underwriting division providing a range of specialist and niche insurance products.

summary: Provides tailored insurance policies for equestrian services, including liability cover and vehicle insurance.
explanation: The summary focuses on the main services provided, including tailored insurance policies for equestrian activities, liability cover, and vehicle insurance, omitting location details and company name.
clean_content:
We pride ourselves on good customer service. We will support you every step of the way when setting up your policy and when you need to make a claim. 
In the unfortunate event that you need to make a claim, we will be with you throughout the entire process to make it hassle-free for you.
We have a full suite of cover from horseboxes, 4×4 towing and horse transporter cover to riding schools, clubs and equestrian centres. 
We also have liability cover, as well as more general horse and pony insurance. 
We can cater for your needs and tailor our policies to suit you. 
As a broker, we have access to some great rates through our relationships with the insurers. 
That means we are able to shop the market on your behalf to find you a great price.
label_description: Provides financing options and insurance services for horseboxes.

warning to shareholders
we are aware that some shareholders may have received unsolicited telephone calls or correspondence concerning investment matters. these are typically from overseas based organisations who target uk shareholders offering to sell them, what often turn out to be, worthless or high risk shares in us or uk investments. they can be extremely persistent and persuasive. shareholders are therefore advised to be very wary of any unsolicited advice or offers.
please note that it is most unlikely that either the company or the company’s registrar, link asset services, would make unsolicited telephone calls to shareholders. any such calls would only ever relate to official documentation already circulated to shareholders and never in respect of investment ‘advice’.
if you are in any doubt about the veracity of an unsolicited telephone call, please call the company secretary +44 (0)800 389 4696 or the registrar on +44 (0) 371 664 0300.
you can also report and get advice about fraud or cyber crime by contacting action fraud – national fraud & cyber crime reporting centre 0300 123 2040 and visiting their website at www.actionfraud.police.uk.
welcome to the brunner investment trust
seeking out the best opportunities for growth and reliable dividends wherever they may be, the brunner investment trust invests in companies all over the world. brunner aims to provide investors with growth in capital and dividends over the long term. we measure the trust’s performance against the benchmark index (70% ftse world ex-uk index and 30% ftse all-share index).
share price is the price of a single ordinary share, as determined by the stock market. the share price above is the mid-market price at market close.
share price
1100.0p
net asset value (nav) per share is calculated as available shareholders’ funds divided by the number of shares in issue, with shareholders’ funds taken to be the net value of all the company’s assets after deducting liabilities. the nav figure above is based on the fair/market value of the company’s long-term debt and preference shares (known as debt at market value). this allows for the valuation of long-term debt and preference shares at fair value or current market price, rather than at final repayment value (known as debt at par).
nav per share
1198.2p
premium/discount. since investment company shares are traded on a stock market, the share price that you get may be higher or lower than the nav. the difference is known as a premium or discount.
premium/-discount
-8.2%
dividend yield is calculated using the latest full year dividend divided by the current share price.
dividend yield
1.8%
data source datastream and allianz global investors as at 25.11.2021 based on market close mid price.
new to the brunner investment trust?

why invest
our history
the brunner investment trust plc (brunner) was formed from the brunner family’s interest in the sale of brunner mond & co, the largest of the four companies which came to form imperial chemical industries (ici) in 1926. today, brunner shares are available for everyone to buy and are widely held by both private and institutional investors.

summary: Global investment trust providing long-term growth and income through diversified portfolio of dividend-paying stocks.
explanation: I focused on the business activity, omitting location and company name, and condensed the text into a concise summary.
clean_content:
The Brunner Investment Trust PLC is a global investment trust that aims to provide long-term growth and income. 
The trust invests in a diversified portfolio of companies worldwide, with a focus on quality and growth. 
It seeks to offer a combination of capital growth and income, with an emphasis on dividend-paying stocks. 
The trust is managed by Allianz Global Investors, a well-established investment management company. 
The trust's objective is to provide a total return to investors, with a focus on long-term growth and income generation.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

our in-house team of actuaries have over 90 years combined experience and are available to support the needs of those responsible for group schemes or who require actuarial assistance for a specific project.
this means providing first-rate, personal service to trustees and sponsoring employers of occupational pension schemes and prepaid funeral trusts.

clean_content:
Embark Actuarial provides specialist actuarial services to trustees and directors of SMEs. 
They offer a range of services including actuarial consultancy, pension scheme valuations, and corporate financing planning. 
Their team of actuaries has over 90 years of combined experience and provides personalized service to clients. 
They work with a range of clients, including those in occupational pension schemes, and offer services such as pension scheme mergers and reconstructions. 
Embark Actuarial is part of the Embark Group, a diversified financial services business.

our diversity & inclusion policy
×
1. principles
newable welcomes the diversity of its employees and is committed to the principles of diversity, inclusion and equality of opportunity. we value and promote:
1. attracting employees from all sections of the community
2. identifying, using and developing the skills and talents offered by employees and potential employees of newable, to the benefit of individuals and the company
3. the awareness that unlawful discrimination is wasteful of skills, talent and creativity.
we recognise the negative impact on employees of the effects of discrimination on achievement of objectives, personal and company morale, career progression, self-fulfilment and self-esteem. all employees and those acting on behalf of newable are personally responsible for upholding this policy, and must refrain from taking any action or decision which is contrary to the letter or the spirit of this policy. the senior person with responsibility for the effective implementation of this policy is the chief executive officer.
this policy is updated regularly in line with legislation, and reviewed annually.
2. policy
we seek to ensure that no job applicant or employee receives less favourable treatment on the grounds of their age, disability, gender reassignment, marriage and civil partnership, pregnancy and maternity, race, religion or belief, sex or sexual orientation, or any other unlawfully discriminatory grounds such as trade union membership or part-time working status. we will not disadvantage applicants, employees or any others working on behalf of the company by imposing unjustifiable provisions, criteria or practices.
we will not, during recruitment, selection, training, promotion, disciplinary, dismissal or any other employment activity:
1. treat any individual less favourably than others on any unlawfully discriminatory grounds;
2. impose on any individual a provision, criterion or practice that unlawfully disadvantages an individual when compared with others;
3. discriminate unlawfully against any individual because of his or her association with someone who has a protected characteristic.

divitias wealth plc are experts in wealth creation and onward maximisation
with a reputation for exceptional service and discretion we leverage our long-standing relationships with leading global providers of investment products, structures, vehicles and programs to the benefit of our clients.
divitias wealth plc has been established based on comprehensive financial market analysis and the subsequent opportunity identified to offer investors access to high yield trade programmes, which can be extremely exclusive due to their demanding entry requirements. the divitias wealth plc bespoke, client-centric, high-touch service forms the cornerstone of our unique and valued investor proposition.
our team
members of our team have the proven expertise, passion and seasoned experience to place both individual and corporate investors in to exclusive and high yield trade programmes.
our company has applied this combined knowledge and associated skills to structure the divitias wealth plc private offering protected fixed income bond for investors who are seeking a higher than average yield to other bonds in the market.
superior results through collaboration
the process to gaining access, and the selection of trade programmes and partners, leading to the purchase of discounted securities for the divitias wealth plc investment portfolio, is accompanied by a stringent due diligence process.
our comprehensive due diligence process, undertaken and co-ordinated by our regulated professional service providers, is based upon long-standing collaborations and relationships with fund managers, traders and regulated market professionals all of whom who have a high pedigree and proven success sustained over time in the financial sector.

jon dowdeswell fmaat is licensed and regulated by the aat under licence number 91459. the aat is recognised by hm revenue & customs and hm treasury to supervise compliance with the money laundering regulations and jon dowdeswell and davis & co are supervised by the aat in this respect.
davis & co is a family run accountancy practise, based in the new forest and was established in 1989 by john davis and his daughter laura.
in 2004 jon dowdeswell fmaat, laura’s husband, took over as principal. since then the practice has grown from strength to strength serving clients in and around the new forest, as well as all over the uk, including some overseas clients. jon has 20 years accountancy experience under his belt, and is a fellow of the association of accountancy technicians.
jon and laura operate the practice from a purpose built office at their home, so don’t have the overheads of a large high street office. it’s also very much a family concern with laura’s brother dealing with their payroll.
we hold full professional indemnity insurance cover through trafalgar insurance company, the lloyds building, 12 leadenhall street, london, ec3v 1lp. the territorial coverage is worldwide, excluding usa and canada and its dominions and protectorates.
our aim is to provide a professional, but friendly approach to all your accountancy needs. we are available to meet clients at a time and place convenient to you, and to fit in with your business commitments.
we are able to assist with all your accountancy needs, from individuals, sole traders and partnerships to limited companies and limited liability partnerships.
