They provide discretionary portfolio management, tax-efficient investing, inheritance tax planning, and stockbroking services. 
Their approach is centered around creating personalized investment portfolios that cater to each client's unique needs and goals. 
The company emphasizes its commitment to delivering high-quality service, with a focus on building long-term relationships with its clients. 
Their team of professionals has extensive experience in managing investments and providing expert advice. 
They offer a range of services, including fund management, and have a strong focus on research and analysis to inform their investment decisions. 
The company's mission is to provide innovative and effective solutions that meet the evolving needs of their clients. 
They prioritize building trust and delivering exceptional results, with a focus on long-term success. 
Their services are designed to help clients achieve their financial objectives, whether it's wealth accumulation, income generation, or legacy planning.

summary: Issues banknotes and coins, manages foreign exchange reserves, regulates the financial system, sets monetary policy, and oversees banking.
explanation: I focused on the main economic activities, services, and outputs mentioned in the text, omitting location-specific details and structuring it concisely.
clean_content:
The Bank of England is responsible for maintaining monetary stability, financial stability, and promoting the development of the financial system. 
The bank issues banknotes and coins, manages the nation's foreign exchange reserves, and regulates the financial system. 
It also sets monetary policy, maintains financial stability, and oversees the banking system. 
The bank is divided into several sections: 
- Monetary policy 
- Financial stability 
- Banking 
- Markets 
- Prudential regulation 
- Research 
- Statistics 
- Education 
The bank also provides various services, including 
- Payment and settlement systems 
- Financial market infrastructure 
- Banking supervision 
- Resolution 
- Crisis management 
- Financial stability 
- International cooperation 
The bank's main objectives are 
- To maintain price stability 
- To support the development of the financial system 
- To promote the development of the economy 
The bank also engages in 
- Research 
- Analysis 
- Policy development 
- International cooperation 
The bank is committed to 
- Transparency 
- Accountability 
- Good governance 
The bank's activities are 
- Regulated 
- Supervised 
- Monitored 
The bank also provides 
- Financial services 
- Banking services 
- Advisory services 
The bank's main goal is 
- To maintain financial stability 
- To promote economic growth 
- To support the development of the financial system
label_description: Services related to financial planning, investment, and management.

accountancy services, london – trust, transparency, confidentiality

business services
we offer business clients an intelligent and resourceful service, not only as accountants, but also as consultants and advisors. we help our clients formulate their strategic priorities – and provide rigorous analysis and advice on mergers, acquisitions, and disposals.

personal services
our private clients have a peace of mind that comes with knowing that their affairs are dealt with in a diligent professional manner including written explanations of any changes or proposals from one year to the next. our services encompass all aspects of personal tax and estate planning.
more

we are a firm that cares about our clients and for whom their needs are paramount. we strive to provide exceptional value and pride ourselves on offering a fair fee for our services with no nasty surprises hidden in the final bill.
more

our aim is to team up and build a relationship on trust, remaining transparent at all times and maintaining confidentiality.
we pledge to bring fresh insight to your business or financial affairs, and deal with issues you face with a rigour and flexibility that allows you to prosper.
elliotts shah prides itself on its ability to promote strategies that help build your company's growth and consider financial aspects with a view to enhancing and retaining value building. the firm has a unique level of experience gained by its partners and the talented, enterprising teams built around them.
the firm is based in the city of london, but works for clients throughout the uk and overseas.

embark group continues to monitor the coronavirus to support our clients and ensure the safety of our employees. for more information, tools and resources please visit our covid-19 page.
embark group continues to monitor the coronavirus to support our clients and ensure the safety of our employees. for more information, tools and resources please visit our covid-19 page.
embark property is part of the embark group, a fast growing, diversified, financial services business and one of the largest retirement solutions providers in the uk. it provides property services to the following companies within the group:
embark pensions – full sipp
rowanmoor ssas
rowanmoor – family pension trust
the team also provide property services to the existing back book of customers of rowanmoor sipp and solo ssas, ebs sipp, sappp and ssas and hornbuckle sipp, flexible income pension plan and ssas.
this website provides information about the property services we provide through our group companies. please note it is primarily for use by advisers and customers in conjunction with their adviser. the information and opinions provided are for guidance only and are not intended as investment advice. we recommend that you seek advice from a recognised investment professional before making any decision to invest in property or one of our products.
buying commercial property via a pension can be a tax-efficient way to inject cash into a business and provide regular income for the scheme in the form of rent. it is also possible for the pension to borrow up to 50% of the net value of the scheme to assist with the purchase provided the rent is sufficient to cover loan repayments.
our property team has over twenty years experience in buying, administering, and selling commercial properties in pension plans to ensure transactions are carried out in accordance with pension regulations and minimise any associated risks. whilst the pension rules for investing can seem complex, embark property are here to assist you and your adviser through the process.
investing in commercial property
how we work
investing in commercial property can be complex and time consuming. our aim for each transaction is to make the process as straightforward and efficient as possible, and we take over the end to end process and deal with all parties so that you don’t have to.
we prefer to work with our panel solicitors who have extensive knowledge of transactions within pensions and know the way we and hmrc work. we have pre-agreed reports and lease documentation in place to simplify the conveyancing process and have negotiated a schedule of fees for each type of transaction. you may still use a solicitor of your choice but this involves more work for us and we reserve the right to charge higher fees.
we will review any proposals to establish whether they are pension compliant and where possible, to avoid incurring unnecessary fees if a transaction cannot go ahead.
we also have an experienced vat team who will a deal with any vat registrations and vat returns required.
something to keep in mind
commercial property can be a less liquid investment and disposal of it may take longer than exchange traded investments. you should take this into account when considering a property investment and the need for liquid assets to pay retirement benefits as and when they fall due or additionally, during times when a property is unlet as insurance and business rates will still be payable.
why us
dedicated, experienced property and vat team
well versed in the intricacies of holding property within a pension scheme
we oversee a portfolio of c6,000 uk properties
we specialise in dealing with all administrative aspects of the life cycle of a property investment from purchase to sale
competitive block insurance cover arranged via our broker, hettle andrews
about embark group
embark group is a fast growing, diversified, financial services business and one of the largest full-scale retirement solutions providers in the uk. we operate successfully in both the advised and institutional areas of the retirement market and power some of the uk’s largest retail financial services businesses. you can find out more information at the embark group website or download our group due diligence guide.

if you are a forward thinking entrepreneur with a strong desire to grow your business, then this is our special service offering only for you. these services provide you with far more tools and support than simply compliance and day to day problem solving. please contact us here
finance director
finance director
our service offerings are cost effective. we endeavor to offer you the best value for parting your hard earned money. it has been proved that our services are a speedy and flexible alternative to a full-time finance director. virtual finance director service we offer enables you to have an experienced finance director at your disposal whenever you need. we have a wealth of knowledge and experience working in small, large and expanding businesses. as your advisers, we understand the finance function and provide you with the knowledge and commercial acumen. this ensures a true financial leadership function in your business.
day to day book keeping and accounting
day to day book keeping and accounting
we’re here to help you spend less time on receipts and invoices. you will certainly have more time on making your business a success. you certainly need to do other things than doing bookkeeping. eraa accountancy and book keeping services are built around modern and innovative techniques. those techniques allow us to understand your business very well. we can set up an online and real time accounting system for you to access anytime and anywhere.
virtual and a complete accounts department
virtual and a complete accounts department
normally the growing businesses don’t have the resources to afford an in house full accounting function. therefore, eraa qualified accountants take care of your day to day accounting needs. this may also include invoicing and credit control. the key benefit of these services is to enable the busy entrepreneurs to focus on managing their business. of course, they will then have time to think on ways to grow their businesses. needless to say, this will save both the valuable time and money. we have the skills and experience to ensure a very efficient and effective accounting system for your business!
on-site bookkeeping services
on-site bookkeeping services
we specialize in providing a very flexible bookkeeping services. this means we act as your on site bookkeeper. while managing your records we can still place our qualified bookkeepers at your offices as and when required. this allows a full productive time at site. in addition, you will have a comfort to discuss any matters with the book keeper at times most convenient and suitable.
off-site bookkeeping services
off-site bookkeeping services
you outsource the bookkeeping. we do it all for you. we use our resources to regularly maintain and report on your financial position. those reports are very timely. this makes it certain that you meet all of the filling deadlines. we manage all your bookkeeping records and produce your accounts. we then report back to you on an agreed interval. this can be every week, month or quarter. this allows a timely discussion on your financial affairs.
tech savvy and innovative accountants
are you looking for a specialist amazon accountant or ebay accountant?are you looking for tech savvy and innovative accountants? then no look further. we are modern,dynamic and truly proactive accountants and tax experts.

scroll
the falco group is an independently owned investment group spanning the core areas of asset management and wealth management. the group’s core ethos is firmly set in delivering transparent open architecture wealth solutions and bespoke investment opportunities to its clients and investment partners.
falco capital
formed in 2012, falco capital is a boutique asset management company that specialises in originating and asset managing a wide range of real estate and private equity investments for high net worth clients, family offices and institutional investors.
investments are either managed in-house or via partnerships with specialist operators and can be structured as a diversified fund or as a single asset play. typically, a fund will have two phases: (1) a seed funding round from falco investors to establish track record and proof of concept and (2) an institutional funding round to achieve scale.
discover more
falco private office
established in 2018, falco private office is a multi-family office based in central london. our clients have access to a full range of services from wealth management and alternative investments through to consolidated portfolio reporting and succession planning.

The group's core ethos is delivering transparent open architecture wealth solutions and bespoke investment opportunities to clients and investment partners. 
Falco Capital is a boutique asset management company specializing in originating and asset managing real estate and private equity investments for high-net-worth clients, family offices, and institutional investors.

welcome to fleet street wealth
fleet street wealth is a chartered, independent wealth management firm. our clients include accountants, business owners and medical professionals; we are one of the main providers of financial advice to barristers and a bar council partner.
contact us
welcome to fleet street wealth
fleet street wealth is a chartered, independent wealth management firm. our clients include accountants, business owners, medical professionals and we are one of the main providers of financial advice to barristers and a bar council partner.
contact us
welcome to fleet street wealth
fleet street wealth is a chartered, independent wealth management firm. our clients include accountants, business owners, medical professionals and we are one of the main providers of financial advice to barristers and a bar council partner.
contact us
your future, your finances: our focus
our focus is firmly upon delivering a bespoke and seamless service across a diverse array of disciplines. through utilising a range of technical experience and expertise, we offer a holistic approach to financial advice. by doing so, we guarantee peace of mind that your savings are invested with a progressive and adaptable firm.
we appreciate that entrusting another with your money can be unnerving. with fleet street wealth it doesn’t have to be.
our services
who we are
we are an independent wealth management firm providing tailored advice to individuals, corporations, trustees and charitable bodies.
our emphasis on agile thinking, pragmatism and meticulousness is, in essence, at the heart of everything we do. bolstered by our chartered status and brought to life by the talented individuals we work with, our aim is to deliver effective outcomes to build and protect your wealth. underpinning this, we are resolute in our values of prioritising clients’ interests, upholding ethical standards and acting with integrity.
about us why us? our fees investment approach
our services
whether you are an individual, trustee, charity or a corporate client, our range of services are designed to meet all of your financial needs. there is, however, far more to our firm than the products and services we provide.
view our services
charitable support
our ethical standards extend beyond our professional services. we provide pro-bono advice to certain sectors and bodies and actively encourage our team to volunteer within the local community; raising funds for smaller charities in particular.
find out more
our investment approach
as an independent advisory firm, our investment approach is built on rigorous research and analysis of the market. we understand that our clients have complex requirements and we work with the largest financial institutions to design bespoke solutions to address these. this may involve us sitting on an investment board to provide oversight on your financial affairs, issuing advice on ethical investments or bringing balance to your portfolio.
learn more
what we do
we offer holistic advice, bespoke investment strategies and wealth management; tailored to meet the varying needs of our clients.
services for individuals
we are one of the largest providers of financial advice to the bar. we also have a strong foothold within the solicitor, underwriting and media sectors however personal clients come from all walks of life through individual referrals and from professional bodies.

retirement planning
one of the biggest areas of concern our clients talk to us about is planning for the day they will eventually retire. pensions can be a great cause of uncertainty, with large sums of money held in multiple pots through changes of employment over people’s lifetime. our aim is to help relieve this uncertainty to ensure that, once your working life is over and you start a new chapter, you will be financially comfortable and able to do all the things you hope to do.

when it comes to asset protection advice, our aim is to help you reach your financial goals at the same time as creating protection in case something unexpected happens, whether that’s illness or death. this protection is an important way to ensure your family will be looked after in this situation.

estate planning
there is huge peace of mind in knowing that, one day when you’re not here any more, your family and loved ones will be able to get the biggest benefit possible from your inheritance wishes. our aim in offering inheritance tax planning is making sure you – and your family – are fully aware of what happens to your investments in event of your death, and to make sure your protection is structured in the most tax efficient way.

peter and jane were looking for a financial adviser to better understand their finances, start planning for the future, and simplify their affairs where possible. read the full case study
our latest newsletter
what is a chartered financial planner?
chartered financial planners are a type of independent financial advisor (or ifa for short). ifas are so called because they are not tied to financial products from a particular provider; instead they are 'independent' and can advise on and recommend financial products from the entire market.
here in the uk, ifas are strictly regulated by the financial conduct authority (fca). in practice this means that an ifa is a qualified professional who:
(a) has passed examinations set by the chartered insurance institute (cii), and
(b) is obligated to keep their financial knowledge up to date and in line with the current best practice indefinitely, in a process called continuing professional development or cpd.
less than 5% of fca regulated ifa firms in the city of london have achieved the professional standard of chartered financial planners. here's why:
first, individual plannners must have at least five years' relevant experience in the industry, as well as no less than three years' cpd.
then, they must complete the cii’s advanced diploma in financial planning. this qualification, one of most demanding in the industry, aims to ensure that the ifa's knowledge, ability, ethics and conduct are all without question and meet the cii's extremely rigorous standards.
last, chartered financial planners must always hold valid membership of the personal finance society, an achievement in its own right.
ed's areas of expertise and financial qualifications.
what is a certified financial planner?
a cfp can be seen as a personal trainer for your finances. just like a trainer in a gym asks you to sets goals, keeps a record and assesses how your fitness plan is progressing, a cfp will perform a similar role for your money. you can expect a qualified cfp to do the following:
work out what you are hoping to achieve from your finances e.g. buy a house, start a business or plan a dream retirement.
understand what resources you have currently to meet your objectives e.g. existing income and capital.
create a realistic plan to meet your objectives using some given assumptions e.g. tax, inflation, and growth.
test, adjust and reshape the plan as your circumstances change.
the term certified financial planner or cfp is applied to a financial adviser who has successfully completed and attained the award of cfpcm as dictated by the institute of financial planning (ifp).
the cfp qualification is the only internationally recognized professional financial planning qualification in existence. there are over 900 cfp advisers in the uk and 139,000 worldwide. look for the following charter mark to make sure the firm you deal with include experienced advisers that have attained this valuable qualification.
nick's areas of expertise and financial qualifications.
the fca aims to make identifying a financial advisor that you can trust to provide unbiased, independent advice as easy as possible. the additional qualifications that ed holder and nick combes have achieved, and the firm's resulting chartered status, mean that our financial advice and planning are not only independent and professional, but in the top flight.
find out more about our services: investments & funds, retirement planning and pension consolidation, insurance, mortgages, estate planning and wills, tax planning, and currency exchange.

homepage
koza ltd - an english mining venture with a turkish heritage. a leading light in international gold mining, koza ltd has a track record of successfulsite exploration and development across the uk and beyond.
about us
founded in 2014 and headquartered in london, koza ltd is working at gold mining operations across the world advancing in high potential projects.
our goal is to develop our portfolio of existing gold assets and grow our resource base by acquiring geologically favorable projects around the world. we establish and develop partnerships with companies to create long-term shareholder value.
our team
koza is a well-established company with a history of successful production experience, a management team with a strong track record, and a technical team with an established experience.
hamdi akin lpek – chairman
mr lpek has been an active businessman in turkey for over 30 years. he has primarily been involved in the management of the koza group, a turkish conglomerate that was founded in 1948 by his father, ali lpek.
mr lpek has significant experience takingmining projects fromtheir early stages throughto full production. in the mining and metals sector, mr ipek has played key roles in the success of koza gold corporation, ipek natural resources and koza anatolia metal mining is responsible for setting the criteria against which projects should be assured, as well as determining the vision for the company.
projects
koza ltd is involved in a number of projects in the exploration for gold and other precious metals. koza has been reviewing new acquisition opportunities internationally, in europe, north america, and in west africa shield. we have reviewed in some detail over a hundred projects, have signed cas and taken a very detailed look at about forty projects.
we have joint ventures with walkabout resources to explore for gold and other metals at antrim and slieve gallion in northern ireland
we also have an established relationship with greenore gold plc for gold and silver explorations in scotland at ayrshire and aberdeenshire.
koza controls three nevada gold projects including the poison project with nevada mine properties (nmp), montgomery pass with desert pacif ic exploration in nevada, and goldfield west with minquest in idaho, us.
we want our mining projects to bring sustainable benefit to localareas,fostering mutual trust with local communities.we hold ourselves to the highest environmental standards and are fully committed to transparency in our endeavours.
view projects “view projects”
new projects
we apply investment criteria to evaluate potential new business,with each proposed project scored depending on geology, jurisdiction social and environmental issues.
we are constantly searching for projects that fit the profile of our investment strategy.if you are a potential partner or investor,please get in touch here.
“greenore gold is delighted to partner with koza,a major gold producer.this further supports our belief in the potential for major gold deposits in scotland." (gavin berkenhager,managing director of greenore gold)

Koza Ltd is a gold mining company with a strong track record of successful production and exploration. 
The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in London. 
Koza Ltd has a portfolio of gold assets and is focused on acquiring geologically favorable projects around the world. 
The company has partnerships with other businesses to create long-term shareholder value. 
Koza Ltd is involved in various projects, including those in Northern Ireland, Scotland, and the USA. 
The company's goal is to develop its existing projects and grow its resource base. 
Koza Ltd prioritizes environmental sustainability and transparency in its operations.

section 21 possession claim from £333.00
section 8 possession claim from £350.00
all possession notices £65.00
nationwide eviction specialists
we offer a fully tailored landlord eviction service from serving free notices, issuing possession claims through solicitors, legal representation in court, bailiffs & recovery of rent arrears & costs
eviction process
stage 1 - serve compliant notice - section 8 rent arrears (4 weeks if 6 months arrears or more or 6 months notice if less than 6 months arrears ) & section 21 (6 months notice)
stage 2 - landlord commences possession proceedings through the county court
stage 3 - enforce possession order through county court bailiffs / hceos
stage 4 - recovery of arrears and costs
peace of mind with landlord eviction service
when you instruct us you also have peace of mind as all our claims are issued in accordance with civil procedure rules and are issued by individuals who are regulated by the solicitors regulation authority (sra). as an eviction company we are not solicitors but the claims are issued by them. in addition we have full professional indemnity insurance and employers liability insurance (axa) up to £10,000,000
we address the following
- complex subletting cases
- trespasser procedure
- where a section 21 / 8 wasn't served correctly
- no written tenancy agreement, no problem
- unprotected deposit solutions
- commercial forfeiture
- anti-social-behaviour
- where your managing agents have made errors we rectify them
- adjournments and defences, court bundles
- tenant sourcing and referencing so you get the best tenants
- landlord advice regarding compliance with the new tenancy laws and section 21 possession procedure
- we draft post october 2015 fully compliant tenancy agreements for £50
our fees
our fees are very competitive and we will match any other quote
monthly payment plans available
stage 1 - serving notice on tenant
section 21 / section 8 - £65.00 section 48 - £30.00 notice to quit - £50.00
stage 2 - possession claims
section 21 (accelerated) - £333
section 21 (complex cases e.g. with a court hearing where no contract is in place) - £300
section 8 (rent arrears) - £350
section 8 other grounds - call for quote
trespasser claims - call for quote
legal representation - £120-£180
stage 3 - enforcement
county court bailiffs - call for fees
high court enforcement - call for fees
attachment of earnings - call for fees
rent arrears recovery - call for options
​
commercial eviction
from £400
we accept all major debit/credit cards
​
​
step 1 - the first legal step is to serve a section 21 notice which gives the tenant 2 months notice or a section 8 notice (2 weeks - where there are rent arrears or other grounds for eviction i.e. breach of tenancy). by initiating this first step you are on your way to gaining possession of your property. certain conditions need to be met to serve a valid section 21, and if they have not then we can advise on appropriate solutions to remedy any problems. the notices need to be carefully drafted in order for the process to succeed. if they are not then you will lose valuable time and money.
step 2 - if your tenant doesn't leave after the notice period has expired, then we commence proceedings in the county court to acquire possession of your property and to recover any rent arrears if applicable.. there are three procedures depending on your case. 1 - accelerated - if all conditions are met then you will acquire mandatory possession 2 - standard (s21) - where a court hearing will be required. this is when the accelerated procedure conditions are not met. 3 - standard (section 8) usually rent arrears, but can be any other breach of tenancy.
step 3 - the final step, if your tenant doesn't leave after a possession order date is set, is to enforce the possession order through a county or high court bailiff. the process of using county court bailiffs can be frustrating due to the timescales involved. we can instruct bailiffs and make the process seamless and quicker for you using high court bailiffs. when your tenant has been removed we can also assist in arrears recovery matters. finally, if you you are intending of re-letting we can provide you with a fully tailored professional landlord service for peace of mind.
get in touch
contact us today
please contact us and we will get in touch within 2 hours to review your case. we offer a free 30 minute no obligation consultation

summary: Landlord eviction service offering assistance with serving notices, possession claims, enforcement, and post-possession support.
explanation: I focused on key services like eviction assistance, possession claims, and enforcement, omitting location details and company specifics.
clean_content:
The landlord eviction service offers a comprehensive solution for landlords to regain possession of their properties. 
They provide a step-by-step process, starting with serving notices, followed by possession claims, and enforcement through county court bailiffs or high court enforcement. 
The service also includes assistance with complex cases, such as subletting, trespassing, and anti-social behavior. 
Additionally, they offer drafting tenancy agreements and post-possession support. 
The company emphasizes its regulated status, professional indemnity insurance, and competitive pricing. 
Their services cater to various needs, including section 8 and 21 possession claims, and assistance with tenant sourcing and referencing.
label_description: Services related to finance, including banking, investment, and accounting.

summary: Specialist corporate finance advice for private equity transactions, providing creative solutions and tenacious support.
explanation: I focused on the company's services, specifically their expertise in corporate finance and private equity transactions.
clean_content:
Liberty Corporate Finance exists to support management teams across the globe. 
Their mission is to provide the best advice and get the best results possible for their clients in private equity transactions. 
They have advised management teams across a multitude of sectors. 
Their team is specialist, and they have unrivalled knowledge of the industry and the key decision makers within it. 
They have worked on transactions worth £100m to £500m and have experience with carve-outs, pre-empts, and other types of deals. 
Their clients praise their ability to provide creative solutions, their tenacity, and their people-centred approach. 
They work with management teams to provide them with the best possible outcomes in their transactions.
label_description: Provides financial advisory services, including budgeting, saving, and credit management.

welcome to lothbury pendil
successful financial planning starts with a simple conversation. you talk, we listen.

privately owned and truly independent, lothbury pendil has been having open conversations and providing long-term financial planning for individuals, small businesses and trustees since 2010.

market traders insurance from marketline
if you require public liability insurance for market traders, get an online quote now using the button below. you can also call us on 0207 618 2929 to arrange any market trader insurance.
click here to get a quote now
marketline offers public liability insurance with allianz for traders at markets, events, exhibitions and festivals from as little as £60.40 a year.
marketline is a one-stop shop for traders at markets and events who need public liability insurance but also want to insure their van, car, stock or household buildings and contents. these exclusive insurance products are designed to insure traders at competitive prices whilst still providing some of the widest cover benefits available.
instead of treating you like a number, we provide a personal touch by discussing your individual circumstances over the phone. the range of products we arrange is not available elsewhere so get in touch now and see what deal we can offer you.
find out more about our range of insurance products for market traders below…
public liability insurance
as market traders operate in a physical environment with high footfall, public liability insurance can provide peace of mind and protect your business if someone suffers an injury or property damage as a result of your market stall.
van and truck insurance
we can arrange van and truck insurance exclusively for market traders and stallholders at events, exhibitions and festivals.
cover can be arranged for panel vans, box vans, trucks, mobile shops and catering vehicles.
stock insurance
in case something happens to the products or materials you keep in stock, we can arrange stock insurance cover at your home or in storage, at the market or in your vehicle.
we offer £2,500 of cover for your market stall, fixtures, fittings and general contents automatically, although the cover level can be increased if required. £75,000 cover for business interruption is also included, as is cover for loss of money and personal assault.
household insurance
we can also arrange household insurance for market traders, with cover for up to £1,000,000 new for old available which can be extended to include accidental damage.
car insurance
we can also arrange car insurance for market traders, which can include cover for business use and carriage of own goods.
other market trader insurance products
as well as the above range of insurance products for market traders, we can also arrange employers’ liability and product liability cover.
employers’ liability insurance is a legal requirement if you employ workers on your market stall and provides cover in case an employee is injured or falls ill as a result of working on your stall.
product liability insurance covers compensation payments and legal costs should a product that you sell cause injury or property damage to a third party. this includes cover for food poisoning resulting from any food and drink products you have produced or prepared.
to find out more about all of the insurance products we provide for market traders, contact the team at marketline today for your own personalised quote.

The company provides permanent and temporary staffing solutions, working with clients to understand their needs and deliver suitable candidates. They focus on building relationships with both clients and candidates, offering a personalized approach to recruitment. company overview
team profile
mars energy was originally founded in 2007 by a group of likeminded amazon shares price individuals that saw an opportunity to provide expert oil broking services to the oil industry. since its inception mars has focussed on building a reputable team that holds the company values dear, we focus on service and providing the best information and execution to clients. over the past seven years mars team has grown from three people to ten experienced brokers that now generate a competitive market. due to our existing relationships in the oil market the management team added a swap futures team that compliments the existing business and further advances the platform trading strategy of products and services that we can offer clients.
mars energy specializes in brent, wti and gasoil futures on both ice and nymex, we provide liquidity and up to the minute information to clients through an unrivalled pool of relationships and application of technology.
mars energy acts solely as an intermediary, matching buyer and seller. it has no proprietary interest in any trade it helps to arrange, so the focus is exclusively on the quality of information, price discovery and trading liquidity it brings to each client

maven bonds series 1, series 2, series 3 and series 4 are now fully funded, closed and deployed.
we are pleased to announce the launch of our new series 5 and series 6, residential development focused fixed term bonds, open for investment from january 2021.
fixed term bonds. asset-backed investments made simple.
maven bonds provide investors with access to fixed term investments by generating returns from making secured loans available to experienced companies within the uk’s property sector.
our approach enables investors to benefit from higher interest rates when compared to many other alternative investments, whilst supporting the uk’s residential and commercial property development market.
download guide
why maven bonds?
investors with money in cash savings are experiencing historically low returns. with maven bonds, as an investor you can benefit from better risk adjusted returns through a portfolio of secured loans to the uk’s property sector.
quality deal flow
our team have developed a quality pipeline of pre-vetted transactions for this bond offer. our robust due diligence processes and best practices are already embedded.
security
all loans are asset-backed, generally secured by a first ranking charge. an independent security trustee, city financial, has been appointed to monitor and enforce investor's security.
portfolio diversification
we manage risk by building a balanced and diversified portfolio across a number of property sectors throughout the uk.
attractive returns
in a low-interest rate environment, maven bonds has the potential to generate returns of up to 7.75% p.a.
tax-free interest
enhance your returns by receiving interest tax-free by investing through maven bonds innovative finance isa.
invest now

the innovative finance isa is not a cash isa. your capital is at risk and returns are not guaranteed. view our full disclosure document that provides details about our investment offering and outlines the risks involved. tax treatment depends on the individual circumstances of each investor. to view the information memorandum click here.

investing for a better return
investors with money in cash savings are experiencing historically low returns. our aim is to provide investors with access to a range of asset-backed, fixed term bonds that have the potential to deliver a better risk-adjusted return.
our bonds provide finance to experienced borrowers within the uk property market. this allows us to target higher rate returns that aren’t easily accessed through more traditional investment routes.

security trustee
an independent security trustee, city financial, controls and monitors the security, acting solely in the interests of the bond holders.

"i am looking for an investment product that gives me a better return than my cash isa"
discover more
innovative finance isas can compare favourably to other forms of isa investment, this is not the same as cash isa investing. capital at risk and returns are not guaranteed. maven bonds are not readily realisable and are not covered by the financial services compensation scheme (fscs). you will need to choose which bonds to hold in your ifisa - returns can be earned tax free. tax treatment depends on the individual circumstances of each investor.
what are fixed term bonds?
there are number of different types of fixed term bonds and its important to understand the differences. a fixed term bonds can be a savings bond, an investment bond or a mini bond.
fixed term savings bonds generally offer fixed rates of between 1.5% per annum and 2.0% per annum. some can be held within a cash isa, so the returns are tax free.
fixed term investment bonds mainly fall into two categories, onshore and offshore. the main difference is their tax treatment. onshore are subject to uk corporation tax, while offshore bonds are issued from outside the uk and the returns roll up gross of tax in the funds.
fixed term mini bonds are a form of debt that allows investors to invest in a company or property project and receive a fixed return over a set period of time, with the initial investment returned at the end of the fixed term.
certain mini bonds such as maven bonds are ifisa elibigle and also offer tax free returns.
fixed term ifisa bonds
the innovative finance isa (ifisa) - introduced to the isa family in april 2016 - is an isa account that allows you to hold peer-to-peer (p2p) loans and fixed term bonds and enjoy tax free returns.
there is a limit on the amount you can subscribe to isas each tax year, known as the annual isa allowance - currently £20,000 for the tax year 2019/20. this allowance can be fully invested in an innovative finance isa, or spread across the different types of isa, including cash isas, stocks and shares isas or a lifetime isa.
to be eligible to open an ifisa, you must be a uk resident aged 18 or over.
risk warning
the maven bonds product is available solely to experienced investors who are certified as sophisticated, high net worth or professional investors.
investment through maven bonds plc places your capital at risk and returns are not guaranteed. past performance is not a reliable indicator of future performance. maven bonds does not make personal recommendations or give advice. before investing, you should make sure that you fully understand the risks which are set out in the information memorandum and determine whether the investment is suitable for you on the basis of all the information contained therein. bonds are not readily realisable and are not subject to the same protection from the financial services compensation scheme (fscs) as deposits. tax treatment depends on individual circumstances of each investor and may be subject to change in future. if you are in any doubt about the contents associated with the maven bonds platform and information memorandum or the action you should take, we strongly recommend consulting an independent financial advisor.
the content of this promotion has not been approved by an authorised person within the meaning of the financial services and markets act 2000. reliance on this promotion for the purpose of engaging in any investment activity may expose an individual to significant risk of losing all of the property or other assets invested.

about us
maze provides expert permanent and contract recruitment solutions to the financial services sector, specialising in investment banking, consultancy, asset management, fund management, insurance & reinsurance, accountancy, and the rapidly expanding fintech sector.
having been successfully trading in our niche sector since 2001, we believe that our impressive reputation is a result of our professional approach to recruitment, unrivalled networks and a team based consultative methodology.
we’re extremely proud to be relied upon by clients and candidates both in the uk and internationally, and benefit from having location experts placing
people into our 26 countries worldwide. our core values of integrity and transparency are unfailingly applied throughout the recruitment process. we believe that a true partnership between our clients and candidates should be an enjoyable experience as well as an exciting opportunity for everyone.
we are always conscious that our clients are making an important investment of time and money when hiring talent and our candidates are making crucial decisions that will impact their future careers and lives. it is essential for maze to ensure that both parties have made the best decisions, and in doing so we have been rewarded the respect of the industry.

these things, and importantly this means that there is a level of trust such that i would recommend him to friends and family. john r. of london (april 2018) when i joined mb capital as a client i wanted a share portfolio in a range of industries that would deliver some growth and some income. my conversation with mbc helped me find a range of interesting stocks from tech to retail. i am also impressed with the level of client contact. regular telephone contact helps me make buy or sell decisions that so far have proved to be profitable ones. ideal. trevor i. of bedfordshire (june 2018) mb capital have been looking after my portfolio for about 3 years and dr james ingram has been my dedicated point of contact for about a year. james is very pleasant to deal with and more particularly is extremely professional in his approach. we speak several times a month and he is always looking out and checking the progress on my stocks and phones me to discuss any opportunities to both buy and sell. i would have no hesitation in recommending his services. mr. s. hallett - north scotland now in my eighties i have invested such funds as i had accumulated in various savings within my bank. earlier this year i was complaining to a personal friend about the poor returns i was receiving. it seemed that the benefit was in the main to the advantage of the bank and the returns to the customer were minimal. my friend recommended that i try mb capital. this was some of the best advice i have received for many years. dr james ingram of mb capital has worked wonders in putting forward suggestions for a basic portfolio and subsequent changes that have been financially rewarding. i am a simpleton on the financial market's whys and wherefores. james has been leading me by the hand through the mystiques of the exchange in a courteous and friendly fashion.
not only has his advice been to my capital gain but i have enjoyed immensely the process of increasing my capital and 'pocket money'. i look forward to james's telephone calls and subsequent emails be the same as any other valued client at our company. this is why we do not pigeonhole clients but discuss all of the available options and create an investment that ticks all of the boxes for you. open your account as a client with mb capital you will have an allocated personal investment adviser who will be your primary point of contact. the duties of your investment adviser are not limited and we encourage all clients to take full advantage of this aspect of the service. we pride ourselves on the close relationships our investment advisers have with our clients. through building this personal relationship we will fully understand and help achieve your individual investment objectives. as a client you will have access to all of our investment research which is regularly published in the national press. our research covers all areas of the market. mb capital also provide advice on the timing of buying and selling into or out of positions from short term trading ideas to a macroeconomic overview. this incorporates constructing a portfolio of conventional equities, funds, gilts and bonds. our advice is tailored and designed for each individual client to match their growth that exceeds their current returns. we take it upon ourselves to understand the individual needs of each and every client in order to assess and achieve the suitable level of risk and reward. our investment advisers are able to advise on an array of products and services to ensure your needs and expectations are not only met but exceeded. as a result of our client based focus, our research about mdfm
michael davey financial management (mdfm) is a firm of fee-based independent financial advisers and investment managers, offering bespoke advice on all aspects of financial planning.
established in 1980 and based in the city of london, we have been providing comprehensive long-term financial planning advice to our clients for over forty years. today we advise a wide range of individuals, with many of our clients being city-based professionals, both in the uk and throughout europe.
since the firm was founded, our aim has been to offer a highly personalised and professional service to our clients by offering the highest standard of professional advice and personal service and to create a long-term partnership with clients built on mutual trust. whilst the world of financial services has changed dramatically over the last forty years, our goals remain unchanged.

innovative outcome-based investment solutions
at momentum we have an outcome-based investment philosophy which guides our approach in determining the optimal benchmark or strategic asset allocation for a particular investment objective. read more >
we believe in the value of optimally blending asset allocation, investment strategies and mandates to provide robust solutions with the aim of making the investment journey for the end client as palatable as possible. read more >
we offer various multi-asset, risk-profiled solutions for our investors, in the uk, south africa and internationally. each range has been specifically designed to meet the needs of advisers and their end clients, with a common focus on achieving set outcomes and smoothing the journey towards them. read more >
investment consulting
independent advice to uk pension schemes
we have a wealth of experience spanning strategic advice, risk management, portfolio construction and implementation. in an industry that is moving towards ever-increasing specialisation, we see the value of having experienced generalists who can step back and see the big picture.
investment consulting
responsible investing
responsible investing is part of our core beliefs
sustainable and responsible investment practices are a material factor underpinning investment outcomes for our clients, and also therefore our long-term success as a business.

from financial planning tools to back office, we list the providers and tell you what your peers think of them.
read a review. leave a review.
the nextwealth directory rates and reviews the technology that supports financial planning businesses, including the main platforms and back office providers. the nextwealth directory is for business owners, financial planners, paraplanners and support and ops staff looking for realistic views on what works, and in particular, what pieces of technology can integrate together.
click on a product area below to compare current providers and to read reviews from your peers. please also leave a review of any providers you work with.
practice management system
practice management systems are often the backbone of a financial planning firm’s technology infrastructure, but they are also a huge source of frustration. here we profile the main players, provide user reviews and detail integrations.
view providers
cashflow modelling
cashflow modelling has become an integral part of a holistic financial planning service for many firms and supports specific advice processes for others. compare reviews, features and integrations here.
view providers
client portal
“marmite” of advice technology; an essential part of an up-to-date digital offering for some firms and a distraction and non-starter for others. if a client portal is right for your proposition, review features and integration options here.
view providers
platform
price often drives platform choice but poor service is the top reason advisers move assets off of a platform. our directory helps you get the truth about platform service levels, before you put a customer’s money on the platform. we give our view on the relative merits of each platform and share user reviews.
view providers
suitability profiling
suitability profiling has evolved into an integrated part of the advice toolkit for most firms, as well as coming under significant regulatory scrutiny in recent years. advisers need to be comfortable with the methodology and language as well as integration options.
view providers
cash management
cash management tools have become a newer addition to the advice process. if a cash management tool is right for you review features and integrations here.
view providers
other
some tools simply don’t fit in a wider bracket, yet provide much valued services to the advice process. you can explore these tools in further detail including integrations available and user reviews.

grow your business with fast, simple, digital retail finance solutions
contact us
omni capital retail finance is one of the uk’s leading finance specialists, delivering simple and effective point of sale payment solutions
since 2009, we’ve partnered with retailers nationwide to provide their customers with innovative credit solutions that allow them to spread the cost of their purchase.
today, we tailor our flexible solutions to thousands of retail partners across a diverse range of sectors to support their businesses.
market leading technology
we have developed a free to use paperless credit approval system called omniport, which works in connection with our partners’ existing sales processes.
log in learn more
sectors we operate in
outdoor living
indoor living
home improvements
technology & appliances
lifestyle & valuables
sports & hobbies
medical & dental
travel & leisure
other
our solution partners
omni capital retail finance are proud to be members of the finance & leasing association. the fla’s lending code sets out standards in consumer lending that its members will meet when providing consumer finance.
omni capital chose to partner with lendingmetrics to implement real-time credit risk decisioning using its auto decision platform (adp). lendingmetrics is an award-winning fintech and data specialist in automated fraud detection, aml, affordability and credit decision. it’s now one of the most recognised technology partners.
we use transunion as our credit reference agency. as one of the uk's largest credit reference agencies, you can be assured that they give an accurate picture of your clients.
we are proud to announce our latest partnership with a fraud detection provider trunarrative. the trunarrative platform will enable us to offer greater protection to our customers from the risk of financial crime whilst still ensuring a seamless and simple customer journey.
salesforce is one of the world’s top crm systems and omni capital are proud to be working in partnership with them. their slick and simple system allows us to stay close to our retailer partners, building reports and content giving both us and our retailers complete visibility.

summary: Financial planning services for individuals and professionals, including wealth accumulation, tax optimisation, and investment solutions.
explanation: I focused on the key services mentioned, such as financial planning, wealth accumulation, tax optimisation, and investment solutions, to create a concise summary.
clean_content:
Our aim is to help you accumulate and plan your wealth to achieve financial freedom in life. 
The partnership philosophy of the firm allows advisers to be truly independent, guiding you through your life stages to achieve your financial goals. 
You, working in partnership with us, will have complete clarity on how to achieve your financial freedom. 
We provide financial planning services for individuals, accountants, barristers, directors and executives, entrepreneurs, medical professionals, solicitors. 
Our services include five key areas: 
1. Your Lifetime Wealth Model, 
2. Tax Optimisation Strategy, 
3. Investment Independence and Innovation,

independent vehicle finance, contract hire, outright purchase, car and van leasing brokers
penbourne vehicle solutions specialise in all types of new vehicle finance and leasing such as personal contract purchase (pcp), hire purchase (hp), finance lease and outright purchase, but in particular car leasing, van leasing, vehicle leasing and contract hire sourcing the best 2, 3 and 4 year contract hire, car and van leasing special offers for both businesses and individuals as well as short term flexible car and van leasing deals for 3 to 18 months.
contract hire, car and van leasing special offers on all makes and models
we finance and lease all makes and models of new uk sourced cars and vans including prestige car leasing deals from marques such as audi, bmw, jaguar, land rover, lexus, maserati, mercedes-benz, porsche and tesla as well as fleet car leasing deals from alfa romeo, citroen, fiat, ford, honda, hyundai, kia, mazda, mini, mitsubishi, nissan, peugeot, renault, seat, skoda, suzuki, toyota, vauxhall, volkswagen and volvo.
please search online for our latest car and van leasing special offers or call us on 01902 290311 if you wish to discuss your specific requirements with one of our automotive consultants.
one stop shop for all your automotive finance and leasing requirements
if you are looking to finance or lease a new car or van, you may be unsure whether business contract hire or personal car leasing is the most cost effective and tax efficient way for you. we are therefore always happy to offer unbiased vehicle finance, contract hire and car leasing advice on the best way to fund your next new car or van.
whether you need assistance in managing an entire vehicle fleet or simply require a competitive quote for one vehicle, penbourne vehicle solutions will be able to help.
call penbourne vehicle solutions now on 01902 290311 and speak to one of our automotive consultants to discuss your specific vehicle finance, car contract hire and van leasing requirements or request a quote online.

penfida – uk’s leading independent covenant adviser
skip to content
penfida
about us
our services
our team
news
contact us
about us
our services
our team
news
contact us
find out more >
the uk’s leading
independent covenant adviser
penfida provides covenant advisory and corporate finance services to pension scheme trustees and their sponsors.
we help trustees to identify and manage covenant risk, however it may arise, as part of an integrated approach to managing risk in their scheme.
we help sponsors to understand the issues facing trustees and to anticipate their needs, with a view to finding solutions.
why do trustees need covenant advice?
managing covenant risk is central to trustees’ long term objectives to secure members’ benefits. an understanding of a sponsor’s ability to support a scheme, both now and in the future, is fundamental to helping trustees make funding and investment decisions and assessing the appropriate level of risk.
why penfida?
we are a market-leading, independent team of highly experienced professionals providing clear and innovative covenant and corporate finance advice to a wide range of clients across a wide range of industries.
what sets us apart:
independence
our independence ensures that our clients are our only focus
experience
our partners have extensive experience as senior covenant and corporate finance advisers
approach
we have developed an integrated and risk-based approach to covenant assessment
clarity
we provide our clients with clear advice and recommendations
find out more >
passionate about the desired outcome supported by 24/7
commitment – happy to set the bar high and aim for it while maintaining relationships
– michael fairbrother, gkn
there are several things in our security package
which we wouldn’t have without penfida alongside us
– alan johnston, british steel pension scheme
we advise over 100 pension clients ranging from < £50m schemes to some of the largest in the country, representing collectively over £300bn in assets.
our services
penfida provides a full range of covenant advisory services from regular evaluation, affordability assessment and monitoring to advice in specific situations, such as corporate transactions, restructurings, refinancings, contingent asset arrangements and scheme events.
find out more >
latest news
how should trustees be reacting to the potential impact of covid-19 on their sponsor covenant?
covid-19 is a black swan event beyond any of our expectations and all employers are…

covid-19	
our priority is to continue to provide the service our clients have come to expect, whilst protecting everybody’s health and well-being.
we are adhering to advice provided by uk government and health authorities and will continue to do so, following daily developments. in line with our business continuity processes, we are operating remotely and are helping trustees and sponsors respond to these challenging times.
for further information and assistance please contact your usual penfida team member, telephone 020 7337 4100 or email enquiries@penfida.co.uk.

They help trustees identify and manage covenant risk, and assist sponsors in understanding the issues facing trustees. Penfida's services include regular evaluation, affordability assessment, and monitoring, as well as advice on specific situations such as corporate transactions and restructurings. They work with over 100 pension clients, ranging from small to large schemes, and provide clear and innovative advice.

welcome to penn accounts
your specialist accountants serving small to mid sized businesses: taking away the headache so that you can concentrate on your business.
the financial affairs of an individual taxpayer and companies alike are becoming more and more complex, confusing and unnecessarily burdensome. getting it wrong now invariably means there are penalties, surcharges and interest to pay. who wants to pay punitive tax penalties?
﻿
conversely, failure to effectively manage your own or your companies tax affairs can often lead to a potential overpayment of tax that can have a significant effect on cash flow and the business generally.
﻿
all accountants are not the same. some treat you like the number, which is ironic under the circumstances.
at penn accounts, we are different. we are not a burgeoning accountancy practice. we do not have banks of assistants who undertake the majority of the work - for us it is personal.
​
we help you from where you are now as a business, to where you want to go. together.
﻿
accountancy made simple​.

my pr&w
pr&w is an independent, well established, city-based firm of chartered financial planners.
a modern practice with a traditional approach.
we are a modern practice with traditional values – this approach sets us apart.
our priorities are to act in our clients’ best interests and provide the highest level of personal client care. at the same time, we seek new, innovative technological developments. our new app – the pr&w finance hub – and cashflow planning software are two examples of the technology we use to help you have a clear view of your finances.
about us
we have been clients of pr&w since its inception. in my estimation, david and peter have formed a formidable partnership, surrounded with very formidable and capable staff. i believe that pr&w represent a very safe pair of hands. i am happy and confident to recommend pr&w.
laurence & jacky slater
/
retired business owners
peter ruddy has magnificently managed not only my investments but those of my family and friends. i can’t recommend penney, ruddy and winter and their amazing, helpful employees more highly.
mrs susan winwood
/
retired executive
peter and david advise all the family. regular meetings are always informative and clear. i have no hesitation in recommending pr&w to anyone who is looking for a first class service from an ifa. i doubt that you will find better.
mike chapman
/
retired director, skandia group
i was introduced to pr&w while living in australia. my requirements were quite detailed and complicated by having assets in several jurisdictions. within 12 months of returning, our family’s financial affairs had been satisfactorily addressed and in good administrative hands.
terry mccaughey
/
independent non-executive director
as it is nearly five years since sheila and i placed our investments into the hands of pr&w we want you to know how pleased and impressed we have been with the service and advice we have received both from you peter and all at head office.
micky stewart
/
former england cricket manager
i have been working with peter ruddy for many years. to me, pr&w are more than financial planners, they go above and beyond that to make every client feel important no matter how much you are investing. i would highly recommend penney, ruddy and winter to handle your finances.
tanya lake
/
lifestyle blogger & publisher
the level of expertise, professionalism and care that you and your staff at pr&w have provided has been of the highest level. whenever we have sought to invest or to move investments you have provided detailed options for us to consider and after that consideration you have implemented our wishes.

summary: Trading in CFDs, indices, forex, commodities, shares; providing real-time quotes, trading platforms, tools, educational resources, and customer support.
explanation: I focused on the specific services and activities mentioned in the input text, omitting location and regulatory details.
clean_content:
CFDs are complex instruments and come with a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage. 72% of retail investor accounts lose money when trading CFDs with this provider. You should consider whether you understand how CFDs work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.

The provider offers trading in various financial instruments, including indices, forex, commodities, and shares. They also provide tools and resources, such as real-time quotes, and a trading platform.

Their services include:
- Trading in CFDs and other financial instruments
- Access to real-time quotes and market data
- Various trading platforms and tools
- Educational resources and support

They claim to offer:
- Competitive spreads
- Fast execution
- Reliable customer support

They also mention their regulatory status and licenses from various authorities.

summary: Offers discretionary investment management, retirement planning, tax planning, mortgage services, and professional advice.
explanation: I focused on the specific services mentioned, omitting location and company name, to create a concise summary.
clean_content:
Principal & Prosper is a financial services company that offers discretionary investment management, retirement planning, tax planning, and mortgage services. 
They provide tailor-made investment solutions and have over £1.4 billion in assets under management. 
Their services include protecting families, planning for retirement, and investing for the future. 
They also offer professional advice on various financial matters.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

summary: Recruitment services, payroll, audit, tax, HR consulting, talent acquisition, and workforce management.
explanation: I focused on listing the specific services mentioned in the text, being concise and clear.
clean_content:
The business provides recruitment services, with a focus on finance and HR roles. They offer various services, including payroll, audit, and tax recruitment. The company also provides resources and information on industry trends and best practices.

The business seems to have a strong online presence, with a website that features blog posts, news, and articles on various topics related to recruitment and HR. They also have a team of consultants who specialize in different areas, such as finance, HR, and payroll.

The company's services include recruitment, talent acquisition, and workforce management. They also provide resources and support for businesses and individuals looking to navigate the recruitment process.

The business appears to be well-established, with a team of experienced professionals and a strong reputation in the industry. They offer a range of services and resources, including recruitment, payroll, and HR consulting.

The company's website features a range of articles and blog posts on topics related to recruitment, HR, and industry trends. They also have a strong social media presence, with links to their various social media platforms.

The business provides a range of services, including recruitment, payroll, and HR consulting. They have a team of experienced professionals and a strong reputation in the industry.

The company seems to be focused on providing high-quality services and resources to businesses and individuals. They have a strong online presence and a team of experienced professionals.

The business appears to be well-established and reputable, with a strong focus on recruitment and HR services.

select page
pace, clarity and confidence
we speak your language and get things done fast
what we do
who we are
proptech accountants who speak your language
we combine the latest technologies with our expert property knowledge to provide tailored outsourced accounting services. we work with some of the big industry players including reits, hedge funds, overseas investors and family offices. but our business is built on relationships. we give you time to achieve your goals, always striving for you and your business. we will impress you and your stakeholders with excellent day to day accounting and timely, tailored management reporting. we can take the strain from you by a wide range of compliance services including vat returns, statutory accounts and tax.
learn more
what we do
we provide the tools, knowledge and advice to realise your property ambitions. we’re always available and responsive.
outsourced solutions
we use the latest cloud based technologies and apps to take away the hassle of accounting and vat and tax compliance. you can run your business smarter and have time to concentrate on realising your property ambitions.
learn more
reporting
you want real time management reporting in an easy to read format highlighting your key performance indicators. using the latest technologies we will streamline your processes and give you meaningful and timely kpis and financial information.
learn more
compliance
compliance with vat rules, mtd, cis filings, payroll, corporatioin tax and llp filings, non-resident returns, can all be daunting. and the penalties for getting things wrong can have significant impact. let us get things right from the start. we know the rules inside out and we will deal with your filings.
learn more
fd services
you need a reliable and trusted adviser who will act as your “finance director”, cutting through complexity to give you the guidance and advice you need and help build your strategy. our skill set, our tax knowledge and our experience in the real estate sector add real value. rely on us as your fd support.
learn more
tax structuring
the right ownership structure from the very outset and throughout the life of your property business is important, for taxation, commercial, and legal reason. your choice can have very significant implications, in terms of the management of tax flows and absolute after-tax returns. we help you get it right from the start and as you progress your business, avoiding nasty surprises.
learn more
onshoring
the changes in taxation of property held by overseas investors have changed the scales. it now often makes more sense to avoid costly offshore structures and have simple uk ownership structures. if you are non-resident investor we will help you through the choices.
learn more
case study
c2 industrials llp and stenprop
the brief
c2 industrials llp partnered with an institutional investor to form an industrials limited partnership (“lp”), which planned to invest in multi-let industrial properties across the uk.
the industrials lp commenced in january 2015 and over the next 30 months invested over £100m, acquiring 25 multi-let industrial estates throughout the uk. those properties were managed by three agents with different reporting systems and output. harold sharp managed the entire financial operations from day-to-day cash management through to operational and statutory reporting to the management team and investors.
as an institutionally backed investment, c2 industrials was required to produce management accounts within 5 days of each month-end and comply with the reporting requirements of a multinational investor.
the solution
harold sharp managed the industrials lp on a cloud-based platform utilising bank feeds and brought in agents’ records, supplier invoices and expenses via an api enabled application, delivering an integrated solution, which could be managed and accessed remotely.
the outcome
harold sharp designed and delivered a scalable cloud-based solution providing real-time information for a multinational investor with a geographically diverse portfolio managed by multiple property agents.
in june 2017, the industrials uk lp was sold to stenprop. harold sharp acted as advisors to c2 industrials llp and its institutional partner on this transaction, managing the financial due diligence process, advising on the contract and preparing the associated completion accounts.
following the acquisition of industrials portfolio, harold sharp was retained by stenprop to manage the entire financial operations of stenprop’s mli division – now a portfolio of 60 industrial estates valued at £255m. due to the massive scale of the new operation, stenprop decided to take the accounting in-house. the cloud-based integrated systems used by harold sharp were easily portable, meaning that the in-housing was very simple.
harold sharp managed the day-to-day financial operations of a fast growing multi-let industrial (mli) investment business.
contact us
find out how our services and expertise can give you the time and clarity to run your business.

summary: Outsourced accounting services, financial reporting, tax planning, and compliance for property businesses using cloud-based technology.
explanation: I focused on the main services provided by the business, omitting location details and using concise language to fit within the 20-word limit.
clean_content:
We provide outsourced accounting services, tailored to the needs of property businesses. Our services include financial reporting, compliance with regulatory requirements, and tax planning. We use cloud-based technology to streamline our services and provide real-time access to financial data. Our goal is to help property businesses achieve their goals by providing them with the financial insights and support they need.

We offer a range of services, including outsourced accounting, financial reporting, and tax planning. We work with property businesses of all sizes, from small startups to large portfolios. Our team of experienced accountants and financial professionals have the expertise and knowledge to help businesses navigate complex financial regulations and optimize their financial performance.

Our services are designed to be flexible and adaptable to the needs of each business. We use cloud-based technology to provide real-time access to financial data and to streamline our services. Our goal is to help businesses achieve their goals by providing them with the financial insights and support they need.

We have experience working with a range of property businesses, including those with complex financial structures and those with multiple locations. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service and support to each of our clients.
label_description: General accounting services including bookkeeping and financial statement preparation.

Our services include planning and forecasting, accounting and financial planning systems, profit maximisation, organisational design, information systems, and financial training and coaching. 
We work with small and medium-sized businesses, providing tailored consultancy services and subscription-based support to enhance their financial management and strategic planning. 
Our goal is to help businesses achieve success through insightful management accounts, enabling them to make informed decisions and drive growth.

the benefits of financial advice
the most successful investors take financial advice. we will cut through the complexities and use the benefit of our experience to help you achieve your financial goals.
benefits of advice
don’t take our word for it. here is what some of our customers say:
cp, property developer
it was amazing really, i had not considered that my pension could be so flexible. my adviser was really excellent. he came up with the ideas and took care of everything to make it happen. i am very impressed with the attention to detail he showed and the overall service. it took no time at all and he was and is always on hand to help with anything i need. you never know what changes are around the corner, but i feel well placed with my pension.
mc, airline employee
my adviser was simply brill! he got to know me and my situation, carried out lots of work without charging any fees and really took the time to help me understand everything. i’m so glad to have got my pension underway with the help of my adviser and i am genuinely looking forward to our forthcoming review meetings.
ftadviser’s top 100 financial advisers
we’re delighted to announce that quilter financial planning, of which we’re a part, has achieved first place in the ftadviser’s annual top 100 financial advisers list for a second year running.
company of the year
quilter was also awarded ‘company of the year’ at the ft financial adviser service awards 2020. the awards, now in their 30th year, are much sought-after within the financial services industry. they are voted on by advisers with the aim of highlighting the very best in service provision.
news and views
it’s good to keep up to date with what’s going on in the financial market, especially in these uncertain times.
read news and views
stop and think: stay safe from scams
there has been a rise in fraudsters who are impersonating quilter and other financial services providers. they often use techniques such as creating bogus websites, sending ‘cloned’ emails that pretend to be from a real firm, and most recently we have identified fraudsters attempting to convince clients that a bone fide business has changed its bank account details to encourage funds to be paid into the fraudster’s own account.
to become scam smart and reduce the risk of fraud we urge you to review our guidance on how to keep your finances safe by visiting our dedicated stay safe page, which includes a scam reporting form if you believe you have been targeted.

email qfainfo@quilter.com or call 0800 849 1279 if you have any questions or you wish to book a free initial consultation.
