open for business
we want to reassure you that we are committed to providing the best possible service to you during these unsettling times. we are working hard to ensure that you can continue to interact with us, whilst also ensuring the wellbeing of our colleagues. each member of our teams are fully equipped and operational to work remotely for the foreseeable future.
our plans include keeping a watchful eye on the latest government announcements, to ensure we can quickly react as additional measures to halt the spread of the virus are introduced. we have taken steps to ensure we can continue to support your needs during covid and beyond, including:
enabling colleagues to work from remote locations as necessary, using our secure and tested technology
making greater use of video conferencing tools to keep in contact with clients, colleagues and advisers
restrictions on business travel
office phone lines and post are being diverted so you can still get in touch
supporting colleagues to remain resilient through periods of altered working practices
we will continue to adapt to the needs of our colleagues and you, our much valued clients and hope to return to normal working practices as soon as it is safe to do so.
if you have any questions or concerns regarding your investments please don’t hesitate to get in touch.
you can visit our dedicated coronavirus page here for more information.
stop and think: stay safe from scams
there has been a rise in fraudsters who are impersonating quilter and other financial services providers. they often use techniques such as creating bogus websites, sending ‘cloned’ emails that pretend to be from a real firm, and most recently we have identified fraudsters attempting to convince clients that a bone fide business has changed its bank account details to encourage funds to be paid into the fraudster’s own account.
to become scam smart and reduce the risk of fraud we urge you to review our guidance on how to keep your finances safe by visiting our dedicated stay safe page, which includes a scam reporting form if you believe you have been targeted.

summary: Brokerage services for futures, CFDs, equities, and single stock options, including electronic and voice brokerage, clearing, and facilities management.
explanation: I focused on the specific services and activities mentioned, omitting location details and condensing the information into a concise summary.
clean_content: R.J. O'Brien Limited is a multi-asset broker and clearer in London, offering electronic and high-touch voice brokerage services on futures, CFDs, equities, and single stock options. The company provides a range of services, including futures brokerage, voice brokerage, electronic execution, OTC, futures clearing, and facilities management. They cater to various clients, such as financial institutions, brokerage firms, fund managers, and commercial hedgers. The company has a long history, dating back to 1914, and is a leader in developing new technologies and strategies. They offer a suite of services designed to keep clients competitive, including full-service solutions, electronic execution, voice brokerage, futures clearing, and facilities management.

a small self-administered scheme (ssas) is a scheme with full investment flexibility and additional benefits for business owners. it is usually for 11 or fewer members and usually established by company directors, partners or the self-employed, for themselves and their key employees.
we support entrepreneurs, business owners and families with similar long-term investment objectives who are looking for investment flexibility, with access to a full range of asset classes and a loan facility, all within a tax efficient structure.
all members are trustees and jointly control the investments held. we also offer a defined benefit ssas.
in addition to our small-self administered scheme (ssas) we offer a range of additional scheme services backed by our technical expertise and focus on product innovation.
please note this site is primarily for use by advisers and customers in conjunction with their adviser. the information and opinions provided are for guidance only and are not intended as investment advice. we recommended that you seek advice from a recognised investment professional before making any decision to invest in one of our products.

please note rowanmoor ssas does not provide self invested personal pensions. all new sipp applications for the embark group are processed through a group company, embark pensions (a trading name for ebs pensions limited). both rowanmoor and embark pensions are part of the embark group.
if you have an existing rowanmoor sipp, please go to the rowanmoor website. to set up a new sipp, please visit the embark pensions website.
alternatively, please contact the sales representative for your area.
about embark group
embark group is a fast growing, diversified, financial services business and one of the largest full-scale retirement solutions providers in the uk. we operate successfully in both the advised and institutional areas of the retirement market and power some of the uk’s largest retail financial services businesses. you can find out more information at the embark group website or download our group due diligence guide.

home

domicile
contact us
expat tax. us tax. federal return. fbar. fatca.
us tax specialists in the uk
helping to make tax simpler for americans living abroad.
helping to make tax simpler for americans living abroad.
helping to make tax simpler for americans living abroad.
having to manage your us taxes while living in the us can be difficult at the best of times, but living outside of the us can make your tax affairs even more challenging. simply us tax have the specialist knowledge and experience ensuring americans are able to maximise the benefits of living and working abroad, while being fully compliant with their us taxes.
at simply us tax we believe in working closely with our clients to build strong and trusted relationships. we understand that being tax compliant in the us and the uk is important, but also having a tax advisor that invests time to understand your circumstances is equally important.
simply us tax are american expat tax specialists, and our staff are experienced in working with a broad range of clients, from high net worth individuals and senior executives, to americans starting out in their prospective careers.
we are qualified irs enrolled agents and our staff have over a decade and a half of us & uk tax experience at the big four accountancy firms, so you can rest assured that we can assist no matter how complex your circumstances may be.
how we can help
compliance
we can assist with preparing personal federal and state tax returns, and where required we can also prepare local tax returns. we are enrolled agents admitted to practice before the internal revenue service, and can therefore assist in corresponding with the irs on your behalf. if you need to file uk self assessment returns and need assistance with preparing returns we can handle that for you also.
consulting
as us tax specialists in the uk we have an in depth knowledge of uk taxes and how they affect your us taxes. our experienced professional team provide a comprehensive range of specialist tax services to individuals. whether you require us specific advice, uk specific advice, or advice that affects both us and uk taxes we are able to assist.
planning
thoughtful tax planning and preparation are critical to your success and ensures that you do not pay additional taxes unnecessarily. with our deep insight on us and uk taxes we can help to optimise tax reliefs and exemptions in a way that is tailored to your personal circumstances.
click below to find out more about our services and fees
learn more
our commitment to our clients
at simply us tax we are committed to providing the best experience for our clients. we understand the important role that a tax advisor plays in clients’ lives (especially for expats who have to deal with two tax jurisdictions), and often a good client/tax advisor relationship lasts many years. we strive to ensure we can become the trusted advisor for our clients and do all we can to ensure our relationship with our clients lasts as long as possible, and hopefully for life. we believe in investing time in getting to know our clients and their circumstances and we ensure we are available when our clients need us. our experience has proven that the best results come from a good understanding of clients affairs.
dealing with taxes as an expat can be time consuming, challenging and stressful. by providing a complete dual jurisdiction tax service, we aim to relieve as much of this anxiety, so our clients can focus on enjoying their lives as expats without having to worry about taxes.
at simply us tax we offer a wide range of services which can be tailored to fit your needs
our experienced staff are able to provide a variety of services to ensure we can deliver our clients a complete solution for their needs. our personal approach to understanding our clients’ requirements and working closely with them throughout their expat lives, combined with our professional expertise, results in long lasting relationships which often continue after clients have returned home. explore the list of services we can provide, click on the link for more detailed information or contact us to discuss further.
contact us to find out more
us tax return preparation
the tax return preparation for us expats can be more complex than a ‘domestic; tax return, which often require additional ‘foreign’ forms to be completed. many us based cpas are unable to prepare these forms effectively. as part of our core compliance service we can prepare federal, state and local tax returns. we can also prepare form 1040-nr for individuals who are us non-residents and are required to file us tax returns.
us itin services
whether you need to apply for a new us individual tax identification number (itin), or if you need assistance in renewing your itin, we can help. we are irs certified acceptance agents for itin applications.
foreign bank account reporting (fbar)
us citizens and green card holders are required to file the fbar (form fincen 114) if they have non-us accounts and certain thresholds are exceeded. it is a separate form to your tax returns and the requirement to file should be reviewed annually. we can produce the forms and assist in the annual review.
late filing of returns
many americans are not aware that they continue to have a us tax return filing requirement even if they do not live in the us, and as such it may be that they have not filed us tax returns for many years. the irs provides a systems for such people to ‘catch up’ with their tax filings with reduced filing obligations. if this applies to you feel free to contact us to discuss further.
irs notices and audits
as irs enrolled agents, we are able to liaise with the irs on your behalf. so you can rest assured that we can take care of irs notices you receive, or have received, and handle any audits that may arise.
tax planning
the uk is considered to be a ‘high tax’ country and americans living in the uk often end up paying more in taxes than they would have if they earned the same income in the us. however, there are various reliefs and exemptions available (both in the us and the uk) that can help to reduce the impact. careful planning is required to ensure americans minimise their overall tax obligations.
review of prior returns
if you believe there may be errors with previous tax filings, or if you want us to review the tax efficiency of those returns, please contact us and we can help.
estimates & projections
with the reliefs and exemptions available to americans living in the uk it can become difficult to calculate tax liabilities and keep on to up the payments you need to make to the irs and hmrc. we can help with the necessary estimates and help you to manage the process.
uk self assessment preparation
in many cases, americans living in the uk will not need to filed tax returns in the uk. however, you may need to if you are claiming certain reliefs of have income from certain sources. should you need uk tax returns prepared alongside your us returns we can assist. often it is best that both your us and uk returns are prepared by the same preparer to ensure information is reported accurately, efficiently and consistently in both jurisdictions.
uk non dom advice
the uk tax rules for americans and green card holders who are resident in the uk but not uk domiciled can be very beneficial. the practicalities of achieving these benefits can be quite involved and often requires that certain process are followed prior to transactions taking place. we can help you manage the processes and provide assistance in making the most tax effective decisions.
simply us tax
5 chancery lane
london
wc2a 1lg
helping americans navigate the complex world of expat tax
info@simplyustax.co.uk
020 3997 8777
020 3790 8822

summary: Preparing personal and business tax returns, tax planning, representation before IRS, and advice on dual taxation.
explanation: I focused on the specific services mentioned, omitting location details and condensing the information into a concise summary.
clean_content:
At Simply US Tax, we help Americans living abroad with their US tax obligations. Our services include preparing personal and business tax returns, providing advice on tax planning and compliance, and representing clients before the IRS. We understand the complexities of dual taxation and work closely with our clients to ensure they meet their tax obligations in both the US and UK.

Our team of experts has extensive experience in US and UK taxation, and we provide a range of services to help our clients navigate the complexities of tax law. We can help with tax preparation, tax planning, and representation before the IRS. Our goal is to provide personalized service and ensure that our clients receive the best possible advice and support.

We offer a range of services, including tax return preparation, tax planning, and representation before the IRS. We can help with complex tax issues, such as dual taxation, and provide advice on tax compliance and planning. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service and support to our clients.

At Simply US Tax, we are committed to helping our clients achieve their goals and ensure that they are meeting their tax obligations. We understand the importance of tax compliance and work closely with our clients to ensure that they receive the best possible advice and support.
label_description: Services related to tax preparation, planning, and consulting.

clean_content:
Skynet Charity provides online accounting software for charities. 
The software offers various features such as branch accounting, financial management, and reporting. 
It allows users to access the system from any location, with multiple user levels and authorization. 
The software also includes tools for managing payroll, projects, and financial forecasting. 
Additionally, it provides features for debtors and creditors, VAT returns, and data analytics. 
The system is cloud-based, allowing users to access it from anywhere, and it is scalable for different-sized charities.

smyth barkham is a niche firm specialising in all aspects of private client, tax and entertainment law together with other ancillary legal services.
the firm prides itself in providing a tailored service to cater for the legal needs of a varied client base and has evolved from a pure private client firm to one which is able to offer expertise on a much wider range of matters.
the firm advises many high profile individuals in the entertainment industry on tax, commercial and personal matters and high net worth individuals, entrepreneurs, landed estates and trustees on a variety of issues. the firm has particular expertise in advising non domiciled clients in the current challenging tax environment.
many of the matters advised upon are in the public eye but the firm chooses to trade on its reputation for discretion and not publicise itself in the legal press. clients respect this confidentiality and consequently a large proportion of new instructions are based upon client recommendations.

st matthew offers a full range of tax and accounting services to uk businesses. whether you work solely in the uk or are focused on international growth, our bespoke solutions are designed to support you.

many of our clients are european and us-based enterprises with uk subsidiaries, while others are uk companies ready for doing business in the us or europe. whatever your situation, we can help with cross-border challenges and ensure you’re compliant with relevant obligations and laws.

The business provides succession planning and exit planning services. They offer various resources, including a free guide to succession and exit planning. The company helps business owners understand their value, explore exit options, and create a plan for their business. They also provide information on employee share schemes, business valuation, and advisory services. 

The business has a content hub with articles, webinars, and podcasts on topics such as succession planning, exit strategies, and business growth. They also have a news section with updates on their services and industry insights.

Their goal is to support business owners in achieving their objectives, whether it be exiting their business or growing it. They offer expertise and guidance throughout the process.

what we do at swiftbooks accountancy?
here at swiftbooks online accountancy we pride ourselves in being one of the leading online accountants who make the financial side of running a business as simple and hassle-free as possible.
our modern cloud-based accounting software lets you access your accounts from anywhere, providing you have a device and connection to the internet. this enables you to have a better understanding of the financial position of your business. the software also allows you to download real-time financial reports such as; balance sheet, aged debtors report, profit and loss and more.
we can be as involved as you would like; we can manage the whole financial process for you and submit your accounts on time so that you can focus on other aspects of your business or we could explain every step of the way to you and suggest new ways in which you could help move your business forward and save on aspects such as tax and costs.
online accounting services
swiftbooks accounting offer an extensive range of accounting services for a variety of different clientele. our main clients include; limited liability companies, sole traders and partnerships.
see how we can help you
tailored made packages
our tailored made accounting packages include all your accounting needs. we spread the accounting cost throughout the year at fixed monthly intervals to help with cash flow.
see our pricing
unlimited support throughout the year
when enrolled into one of our accounting packages we will offer you unlimited support via email, telephone or skype. you will also have our full support in case of a hmrc investigation.

tomorrow loans
protect your assets; benefit your family
a cost effective inheritance tax solution from an
award winning management team
experienced award winning board of directors
no initial fees and no management charges
competitive cost and target return structure
simple and secure application process
welcome to tomorrow loans
tomorrow loans is a company led by a team of experienced professionals offering a cost effective inheritance tax solution.
inheritance tax (iht), once the problem of only the very wealthy, now captures many more people, often those who have worked hard and saved all their lives. iht is charged on the transfer of value to others. it is a tax most of us come across when someone dies and passes on their assets on death.
inheritance tax is currently charged at 40% for assets above iht threshold of £325,000 (also known as nil rate band) for single person and £650,000 threshold for a married couple or civil partnership. the recent introduction of the main residence nil-rate band means that in 2019/20, an additional £150,000 of the value of the main residence may be passed on to direct descendants iht free. the nil rate band has failed to keep pace with inflation and is expected to remain at the same level until 2021. more and more estates are likely to be charged iht.
inheritance tax liability can be reduced or potentially eliminated with some simple and careful planning.
tomorrow loans offers a simple, cost effective solution for reducing the tax liability on assets passed after your death, enabling you to make business relief (br) qualifying investments. business relief, previously know as business property relief, is a tax relief introduced as a part of the 1976 finance act. initially aimed at reducing the tax liability paid by small business passed on to future generations, today br is an efficient way of reducing iht liability by owning shares in a br-qualifying business. shares owned for at least two years at the time of death can be passed to your loved ones free from inheritance tax.

The investment product targets individuals seeking to minimize inheritance tax, offering a way to pass on wealth to future generations. 
The company emphasizes that its product is a high-risk investment and is not suitable for all investors. 
It is essential for potential investors to consult with their professional advisors before making any investment decisions. 
The company's product is designed to help individuals reduce their inheritance tax liability, but it is crucial to understand the risks involved.

summary: Investment platform providing financial planning tools, reporting, and extensive investment options for clients and advisers.
explanation: I focused on the company's economic activities, services, and outputs, omitting location details and names, to create a concise summary within the 20-word limit.
clean_content:
Transact is an award-winning investment platform offering financial advisers and their clients smart technology, unrivalled support and exceptional service for a modern, efficient way to manage client investment portfolios. 
They provide a wide range of financial planning tools and comprehensive reporting, alongside an extensive range of investments and tax efficient wrappers to make the management of portfolios as easy and efficient as possible. 
Transact has been rated the UK's No.1 investment platform for 12 consecutive years. 
They have over £52.11bn funds under direction, 208,000 clients, and 6,500 advisers. 
Their services include personal support, face-to-face, over the phone and online. 
They offer proprietary technology, award-winning platform, and unrivalled adviser support.
label_description: Services related to managing investments, including portfolio management and financial planning.

as your arrangements become more complex, regular reviews will ensure you're on the right track.
wealth protection

intelligent use of your wealth in retirement to provide the right standard of living.
retirement wealth protection
create
good habits pay off in the long term. take the first steps toward providing for your future security by building a plan, starting with saving towards your first home and ensuring that your employer's pension provision is effectively invested. if you start saving early towards your deposit, school fees and retirement your growth multiplies over time.
build
having set out your key objectives, we provide constant assessment of risk to ensure you achieve your plan. we can consolidate your various workplace pensions to put you in greater control, actively managing them to take advantage of rising markets and positioning against volatility - all the while navigating the jargon and optimising your tax arrangements.
protect
these days retirement tends to be a process rather than an event, and when you're no longer willing or able to work full time the security of your income is paramount. investment strategy is the key to ensuring you carry on living the life you want; while at the same time we must also be up to date with your position regarding care funding and inheritance tax to protect the real value of your estate's assets.

independent vehicle finance, contract hire, car and van leasing brokers
vehicle4lease east midlands specialise in all types of new vehicle finance and leasing such as pcp, hp, finance lease and outright purchase, but in particular car leasing, van leasing, vehicle leasing and contract hire sourcing the best 2, 3 and 4 year contract hire, car and van leasing special offers for both businesses and individuals as well as short term flexible car and van leasing deals for 3 to 18 months.
contract hire, car and van leasing special offers on all makes and models
we finance and lease all makes and models of new uk sourced cars and vans including prestige car leasing deals from marques such as audi, bmw, jaguar, land rover, lexus, maserati, mercedes-benz, porsche and tesla as well as fleet car leasing deals from alfa romeo, citroen, fiat, ford, honda, hyundai, kia, mazda, mini, mitsubishi, nissan, peugeot, renault, seat, skoda, suzuki, toyota, vauxhall, volkswagen and volvo.
please search online for our latest car and van leasing special offers or call us on 0116 402 6121 if you wish to discuss your specific requirements with one of our automotive consultants.
one stop shop for all your automotive finance and leasing requirements
if you are looking to finance or lease a new car or van, you may be unsure whether business contract hire or personal car leasing is the most cost effective and tax efficient way for you. we are therefore always happy to offer unbiased vehicle finance, contract hire and car leasing advice on the best way to fund your next new car or van.
whether you need assistance in managing an entire vehicle fleet or simply require a competitive quote for one vehicle, vehicle4lease east midlands will be able to help.
call vehicle4lease east midlands now on 0116 402 6121 and speak to one of our automotive consultants to discuss your specific vehicle finance, car contract hire and van leasing requirements or request a quote online.

clean_content:
Vehicle4Lease East Midlands specializes in car and van leasing services, offering a range of vehicles from various manufacturers. They provide contract hire, personal leasing, and business leasing options, with services including vehicle sourcing, financing, and maintenance. The company acts as a broker, working with multiple manufacturers and suppliers to offer customers a wide selection of vehicles.

Their services include:
- Car and van leasing
- Contract hire
- Personal leasing
- Business leasing
- Vehicle sourcing
- Financing options

They offer vehicles from various manufacturers, including Audi, BMW, Mercedes-Benz, and Volkswagen. The company provides assistance with finding the right vehicle, determining the best financing options, and managing the leasing process.

Vehicle4Lease East Midlands aims to provide customers with competitive pricing, flexible leasing options, and personalized service. They work with customers to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.

The company is a trading name of Move Vehicle Leasing Limited, registered in England and Wales.

about us
our aim is to provide positive influence in the lives of our clients, to empower and inspire them to make financial and lifestyle choices that give them the maximum chance of bringing true wealth, health and happiness into their lives.
the team
services
whether you need help with growing your business or advice on optimising your personal or family finances, we are here to help you get the best results.
see all services
business services
every business owner needs a team of professionals in the background who provide continuous support and advice. that’s what we are here to do.
personal services
because we establish a one-to-one relationship with each client we are able to offer timely, individual advice on how to improve your personal finances.
specialist sectors
we have also developed a number of industry specialisms over the years, which enable us to provide finely tuned, highly focused services in these sectors.
architects
we act for a growing number of influential architectural practices, which has given us invaluable knowledge and experience in this sector.
building profits
the construction industry is one of the most volatile sectors in the uk economy, and careful planning and advice are needed to maintain efficiency and competitiveness.
contractors
we have decades of experience in this sector, which enables us to provide a complete accounting service to contractors.
film tax relief
we can help you identify whether your company is eligible for film tax relief and also which production costs qualify.
forensic accounting
there is a good chance that at some point in your business or personal life you will find yourself involved in a legal dispute over money.
investment and financial
we believe that because we deal with your accounts we are well placed to offer impartial advice in these areas.
retail
the retail sector has always been one of the most competitive business environments to operate in.
shipping
we have acted for clients in the shipping industry for over thirty years and have gained vast experience dealing with ship owners, ship brokers and ship management companies.

summary: Accounting and financial services, including business and personal advice, company secretarial, corporate finance, and tax planning.

clean_content:
Our aim is to provide positive influence in the lives of our clients, to empower and inspire them to make financial and lifestyle choices that give them the maximum chance of bringing true wealth, health and happiness into their lives.
We provide first class accounting, technical excellence delivered in an approachable and friendly way.
Our services include business and personal advice, helping clients to achieve their goals.
We offer expertise in various sectors, including architects, building and construction, contractors, film tax relief, forensic accounting, investment and financial services, retail, and shipping.
Our team provides continuous support and advice to help clients succeed.
We have a specialist team that provides services such as company secretarial, corporate finance, corporate recovery, estate planning, and personal tax planning.
Our goal is to help clients achieve their objectives and provide them with the necessary tools to make informed decisions.

summary: Empowers consumers to save on home finances by comparing and managing energy, broadband, TV, and mobile contracts.
explanation: I focused on the company's main activity, which is helping consumers save on home finances by comparing and managing various contracts.
clean_content:
Youtility empowers consumers to save on their home finances. 
The platform delivers a suite of native and web-based subscription management tools, 
integrating directly with existing products to provide a seamless user experience. 
Youtility's tools help users control and manage their finances by comparing and saving on 
energy, broadband, digital TV, and mobile contracts. 
The company provides a native user experience, 
revenue diversification, and contextual analytics. 
Their mission is to empower consumers with financial control.
label_description: Services related to finance, accounting, and banking.
